Review Title: Enjoyable hub for traving in the region by train
Happy Review:
Clean and nice room.
Amazing staff at the front desk.
Perfect location near the train station.
Good clean comfy room.  Excellent breakfast.
Hassle free check in and close to Temple Meads station.    Friendly staff.

Unhappy Review: 20.00 a day parking

Review Title: The hotel was: conveniently located, gave a friendly welcome and everything was smooth.
Happy Review: The lady who cleaned my room was excellent. She was polite, friendly and couldn't do enough to make sure I was happy with the room.
Unhappy Review: You were all great.

Happy Review: Reception staff were fantastic, especially Peter, who pulled out all the stops as it was a special occasion. Lovely location too. Easy walking distance to the old city.

Review Title: Good location and friendly and helpful staff
Happy Review: It was fine a wide choice.
Unhappy Review: Carpets were stained in my bedroom otherwise all good

Happy Review: Beds were comfy, shower was great! Staff were friendly and helpful. Parking available and the fee covered 24hr’s
Unhappy Review:
Room service…. Only pizzas available in the evening and you had to go down to the foyer to collect them 🤣 they also took a good 30 mins or so to arrive. 
Unfortunately we also looked out over building work but could see the park from a certain angle

Happy Review: Staff, position
Unhappy Review: Rooms a little old and decadent

Review Title: lovely hotel in a great location
Happy Review:
Room was lovely and clean, breakfast was very nice with a lot of variety
Staff very friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review: The bathroom was on the small side
Finding the entrance of the hotel by car was challenging (there were some road works nearby too). More signs on the road please to direct your customers.

Review Title: Close to all amenities. Great breakfast
Happy Review: Everything except the mattress!
Unhappy Review: The mattress was very hard

Happy Review: Really clean quiet room with amenities such as a TV and high quality toiletries. The staff were really helpful. The location was fairly central and very easy to get to the train station.
Unhappy Review: It was fairly expensive for one nights stay.

Review Title: Overall a pretty successful short stay.
Happy Review:
The location was excellent. 
The staff were helpful and friendly, especially Marta in the restaurant.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast was disappointing - fried eggs had been sitting on hot plate for ages and were hard, the bacon was very fatty.

Happy Review: Room was nice with a comfortable bed, with a very nice office chair (Herman Miller Sayl) and big table for doing some work. Shower came with nice shower gel and shampoo. Good location for the purpose of my stay as I went to Motion night club which is in close proximity to the hotel.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was very disappointing, very limited.

Happy Review: Great central location
Unhappy Review: Bathrooms are quite small but the shower was lovely

Review Title: Pleasant, but did not enjoy breakfast.
Happy Review: Limited; but comfortable public area to sit and have a coffee. Staff very helpful.
Unhappy Review: Cooked breakfast offered a good choice, however this is the second time we have stayed in the hotel and each time the breakfast items were only just  warm and the plates were cold.   The result was all the items on the plate were cold by the time we got back to the table.  I particularly don’t enjoy cold baked beans!

Happy Review: Room was ample ,quite, had a view of the park which was part of a historical church.
Unhappy Review: the room could have been a bit bigger for the price .

Happy Review:
The staff were brilliant! 
The breakfast was very good.
Unhappy Review: The bed in the room was a bit small. The AC did not work very well.

Happy Review: Great staff, warm welcome, personable. Nicely appointed room. Excellent breakfast selection. Close to train station. Would definitely stay again.
Unhappy Review: Air con was unpredictable and bed was a little rickety.

Happy Review: The bed was comfy the shower nice
Unhappy Review: Not being able to park and walking ages to another car park and having no funding from the hotel to compensate for the parking charges like other hotels do

Happy Review: Close to the railway station and not far from centre we enjoyed our stay very much. Nice Staff (eg Dilara and Navi), very good breakfast quality, a comfortable bed and a good shower was provided. Even though we were facing a busy street quality windows allowed us to sleep very well.
Unhappy Review: Socket was only provided at one side of the bed and not on both but there were plenty other sockets all around the room.

Happy Review: Very helpful and friendly staff
The staff was very friendly and the breakfast options were very good!
Unhappy Review: One of the elevators was not working, the heating was not working (we were asked if we wanted to change rooms or a portable heater) and the TV remote was also not working (although they provided new batteries)

Happy Review: Very helpful staff, very nice breakfast and ideal for the station and the Airport.
Check in was polite, bar area was clean however did have to wait quite a while for service however. Breakfast was good but no vegan options.
Unhappy Review: No vegan options at breakfast

Review Title: Good choice for a brief visit
Happy Review: Good location, handy for train station.
Unhappy Review: Dinner and breakfast were only ok.

Review Title: Great for Business travellers like me.
Happy Review: Great location. Everything is within walking distance.
Good quality chain hotel in the centre of Bristol. We have stayed here before, and it does everything it says on the tin. Good breakfast,  with plenty of variety.
Unhappy Review: The car park is very easy to see, but exceedingly difficult to find!

Review Title: Nice hotel, comfortable and good value
Happy Review: Breakfast was good value and reception staff very helpful
Unhappy Review: Really hard to find on the satnav

Happy Review: Nice room and breakfast.
Unhappy Review: The road towards the hotel was closed and no instructions were displayed. We almost missed the event we travelled for trying to find the hotel.

Review Title: Good value, clean hotel with delicious breakfast
Happy Review: Great breakfasts, very helpful staff
Unhappy Review: Hard beds

Happy Review: The Hotel is easy walking distance from Bristol Temple Meads station. The reception staff was very welcoming and helpful. We were given a map and had an explanation how the get to our venue for the evening without really having to ask for it. The walk into the old town part was short. The room was clean and well arranged. The breakfast was good.
Unhappy Review:
The room was very warm and we did not seem to be able to get the A/C to cool it down. Maybe it was just us... but I mentioned it as we checked out and felt that my comment was being taken serious.
A couple of things ran out during breakfast, and we were by no means late, and weren't replenished whilst we ate. We still manged to fill out tummies no problem though.

Happy Review: Great central location, onsite parking though chargeable
Unhappy Review: More info on available car charging points would have been useful, didn't work on arrival but reception did manage to resolves so we could charge the car

Happy Review: Distance from city and staff were fantastic
Great location.  Nice breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Slightly small room but not disastrous.

Room right next to the lift and noise from the lift kept us awake all night . Requested a late check out of 12 agreed. Then  hammering on the door constantly from 11 am would like twice about staying here again.

Happy Review: The staff were sp friendly, yhe food in the restaurant was lovely😍.
Unhappy Review: The sausages at breakfast were very anaemic

Happy Review: Good location, comfortable bed, didn’t mind me checking in at 11pm. My room had a nice view over a park which at night had the trees adorned with lights.
Unhappy Review: The bathroom although clean was so tiny and very dated.

Review Title: Perfect location for town and the train station
Happy Review: We stayed at the hotel overnight prior to catching a flight. The hotel is perfectly located - a few minutes walk from the train station and a short stroll from town. The staff on reception and in the restaurant were very attentive, polite and professional. We enjoyed our stay.

Review Title: High quality central hotel offering excellent value for money
Happy Review:
The receptionist lady (sounded Dutch) was very wlecoming and moved us to a room overlooking the garden at the back.
We only stayed one night as I was going to a concert at the Bristol Beacon and my wife was meeting old friends who live bear Bristol. The central location is perfect for the entertainment areas of the City and the local bars restaurants etc offer a range of cuisine and atmosphere.
Breakfast options were good though both coffee machines were broken - a kind staff lady made us both coffees from a machine behind the bar
Will definitely stay there again.
Unhappy Review: The power on the shower was rather too weak to wash my wife's very thick hair. This was at least partially the result of the head leaking. Some of the wall tiles were cracked (Room 106) as was the shower basin, both probably the result of movement at some point. I reported all this on departure.

Happy Review: Breakfast was fabulous, staff were very helpful and pleasant
Everything was fab. Food to the room (from the bar/restaurant) was delicious and all staff were very friendly
The location
room was good enough, suitable for my stay, location and breakfast was great
Unhappy Review: the parking cost was only obvious after I had reserved the room, it was fine but a bit more transparency would be appreciated

Happy Review: Great location, friendly staff, very comfortable beds, decent breakfast
Unhappy Review: Parking at £20 a night is somewhat steep

Happy Review: The breakfast was superb and the night life in the location was amazing very culturall
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Comfy beds, good showers, lovely toiletries, great location, helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Slightly short on staff at breakfast and gloopy porridge (but rest of breakfast good)

Review Title: Cleaned and suitable for an overnight stay in the city
Happy Review: Easy and friendly check in. Clean and tidy room
Unhappy Review: The bed was very squeaky, everytime you moved over in bed it made a noise which didn’t make for the best nights sleep

Happy Review: Staff friendliness, location, great breakfast
Unhappy Review: Bathroom very small, rooms smaller than look on website
Having to wait for breakfast while the coach trip were occupieing the whole restaurant

Review Title: Comfy hotel near to Bristol station
Happy Review: Bed was comfy and lots of storage space. The breakfast was good and had lots of options. Staff were friendly and let me store my bicycle in the store room over night which was a big plus. check in and check out were quick and easy.
Unhappy Review: Only thing I didn't like was the design of the floor tiles in the bathroom for safety reasons, they're white with a design that looks like splashes of water. So it looks like there's water on the floor but isn't, but when there IS water on the floor, you can't see it

Happy Review: The room was fine, if a little cramped for two people. There were sufficient towels and soaps, etc. Although facing the busy road, the room was quiet. The reception staff were very pleasant, if rather slow in checking in & out. The hotel charge was adequate for the services we received. Bottled water was provided.
Unhappy Review: There were no USB ports in the room, surprising for an obvious business hotel.  There was a fridge but it had been turned off.  There were limited channels on the TV. We were encouraged to have lunch in the restaurant but when we arrived just before 12:00 we were asked to sit in a corner as they were still clearing away after breakfast.  Whilst eating the cleaner progressed with a noisy vacuum cleaner across the breakfast area and then arrived at the corner we were seated at.  She proceeded to vacuum around our table and even under our feet whilst we ate!  We booked the hotel because the car park had EV points.  I know they could not guarantee one would be available but we found none of the 3 points usable and had to go to a local supermarket and sit for an hour to recharge. We did not have breakfast as the lunch we had the day before was most unappetising. Inferior ingredients and tasteless.

Happy Review:
Nice staff
location
Unhappy Review:
cold room
breakfast not great
tv was poor

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review:
Disorganised breakfast arrangement 
Broken arm rest on chair in the room.
Light on the TV where it has probably been damaged

Review Title: CLEAN AND FUNCTIONAL - A GOOD BUSINESS HOTEL
Happy Review: A comfortable business hotel, very clean. Breakfast - could offer vegetarian options, and dairy alternatives. I asked for the oat milk and the memebr of staff wehnt off and don't bother to return.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast - could offer vegetarian options, and dairy alternatives. I asked for the oat milk and the member of staff went off and don't bother to return
 A little further from the centre of town than expected, travel time doubles during traffic.

Review Title: Convenient location, comfortable room, easy to use facilities but a little overpriced (in my view)
Happy Review: I booked this hotel for its location just 10 mins walk from my company's office and less than 30 mins walk to the harbourside area too. Everything was simple and straight forward, staff were friendly and efficient, room was clean and comfortable, breakfast was of a good standard and served from 6am - great for an early start.
Unhappy Review: Small niggles - no small cups for espressos at breakfast. No soft or dimmable lighting in the room (or at least, I didint find it) Similar to many hotel chains, I feel it was a little over-priced.

Happy Review: Great location! Easy walk from temple meads and city centre.
Unhappy Review: NA

Happy Review: Good location near railway station not to far into Bristol town centre.Comfortable room very quiet even thou our room was on the road side. All the hotel colleagues were friendly and helpful especially Navi who was on duty in the morning for breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Can’t really think of anything negative.

Happy Review: Excellent location to transport and restaurants.
Location close to city centre
Unhappy Review: Tiny bathroom

Review Title: Perfect location from which to explore Bristol with most attractions a relatively short walk away
Happy Review: Great location and very friendly staff
Location, staff
Unhappy Review: Broken light in room, room upgrade to king didn’t feel like much of an upgrade

Review Title: Perfect, out of town, within easy reach of town stay.
Happy Review: The property is ideal for us, as we travel by train. 5 mins walk tops, and we’re at the hotel. It’s a bit further into town, but still very central. Some lovely areas to pass through and things to see on the way. It’s a quiet hotel and the staff went out of their way to make sure our stay was pleasant.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: The breakfast was good, the staff excellent.
Unhappy Review: Paying an extra £20 for parking

Happy Review: The bed and the breakfast were excellent
Unhappy Review: No arm chairs in the bedroom

Review Title: We have stayed at the HGI in Bristol a few times. It’s close to the station, has parking, the rooms are OK, dinning room
Happy Review: Good location, nice staff
On site parking, albeit £20 per 24 hours. Great location. Quiet room.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was average for a 4 star hotel.

Happy Review: Shared facilities were lovely. The breakfast was very good, lots of variety. Great location for heading to the shopping centre or the theatre which is what we were there for. The reception staff were very welcoming and accommodating too.
Unhappy Review: The room was a little tired in places and needed some updating. Wonky switches, toilet roll holder, paint chipped off the skirting. It could have done with better sound proofing too, we could hear the couple above us quite clearly!

Review Title: Ideal spot for a weekend visit.
Happy Review: Great location, close to the train station and the city centre, but also quiet enough to have a relaxing stay. The team were incredibly helpful and friendly from start to finish, and the breakfast was good to wake up to
Unhappy Review: Late night room service would have been helpful, but we were able to order in Uber Eats, so there was a suitable alternative.  The front desk were very happy to suggest this.

Happy Review: Good location, good staff, nice breakfast
Unhappy Review: One of the towels provided wasn’t clean

Happy Review: Rooms were gd staff great and welcoming and bar and breakfast v good
Clean and quiet
Unhappy Review: Couldn’t work the room temperature so cold!

Happy Review: Easy to find, very clean, great staff
Unhappy Review: Loved it

Happy Review:
Lovely  clean hotel
 Staff are lovely. Close to station and City centre
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Good location, close enough to the centre. Staff were very helpful and pleasant.
Happy Review: The locality to Bristol Temple Meads
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: Would definitely stay here again and would recommend the hotel.
Happy Review: The location is excellent. Within easy walking distance to restaurants and pubs and The Fleece where we had booked to see a show. Very good breakfast included in the price.
Unhappy Review: Finding the place was a bit of a nightmare but, to be fair this was aggravated by all the construction work going on in the area. To my mind the car parking charge of £20 per 24 hours is a bit of a liberty. Although the breakfast was first-class the organisation was a bit chaotic.

Happy Review: Modern, spacious, clean
Unhappy Review:
Creaky beds!
We did sleep well though so that’s good.
Reception staff not massively friendly, could be a bit friendlier
Too hot…couldnot adjust airco

Review Title: Great team at this spotless city centre hotel
Happy Review: Bar / restaurant/ reception team were excellent. Hotel and room were spotless.
Unhappy Review: Even on the lowest setting, I couldn't get the Aircon cool enough.

Happy Review: Good value for money. It is a little older so some parts a bit dated, but overall a really nice place to stay. The staff were excellent.
Location was great
Unhappy Review: Room was dated and the temp control  did not wirk well

Review Title: A good location for a theatre visit. Nice and quiet and only a short walk to the city centre. A good breakfast with plen
Happy Review: Very nice breakfast and a reasonably short walk to town
Unhappy Review: Bed was uncomfortable

Happy Review: Great location near the train station. Hotel very comfortable with friendly staff. Lovely breakfast with plenty of choice.  Were able to leave our bags prior to check in.
Location was great and room very comfortable
Very good English breakfast served in a nice restaurant.
Very helpful staff
Bed nd bathroom
Unhappy Review: There is nothing

Happy Review: Breakfast was good however, no waffles available 😞
Unhappy Review: Room 426, room was small, bed was uncomfortable and the toilet flush was poor

Review Title: Great location for us and great bar at the garden behind the hotel.
Happy Review: Location to linking travel. Breakfast included. Young Staff in the dining room were super attentive and observant! Well done. Receptionist was also helpful at check in as my card locked out.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast cooked to order would be fantastic.

Happy Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful on reception
Unhappy Review: Bathroom had a bit of mould in the grout but it was clean

Happy Review: After a long drive to reach the hotel the gentleman receptionist was so polite and welcoming ( he stated he lived in belper for a while) - a credit to the hotel ; Location is great - city centre and close to alot. Room was clean and the towels were large and fluffy, always a plus!!
Unhappy Review: The chair in the room was tatty - the arm rest looked like it had be gnawed !! ( room 216)...

Happy Review:
The hotel was well situated between station,  theatre and shops.
Very clean and presentable. 
Friendly staff.
Lovely breakfast with a good selection of food and drinks.
Would recommend to family and friends and would stay again.
Location
The hotel was conveniently located and easy to find. The breakfast was gorgeous and the bed extremely comfy. Good wifi and very friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: I was a bit disappointed with the room size, I was promised a King Room but it felt cramped, the mini fridge was also unstocked and broken.

Happy Review: Overall experience is good, however we had expected a little bit better. The hotel has not been renovated for a while and it doesn't feel like 4-stars accommodation. But the breakfast was excellent and the staff were very helpful.
Warmth, comfort gluten free bread
Unhappy Review: toilet roll holder could have been cleaned

Review Title: Quick break to see a show.
Happy Review: Breakfast was good, lots of choice.
Unhappy Review: Room cold, air con noisy.

Review Title: I enjoy staying at the Hilton Garden. But feel it isn’t quite as good as it once was.
Happy Review: Easy access to train station. Clean and tidy.
Unhappy Review: The room was cold. And didn’t warm up all night. And breakfast needed to be hotter. The bacon was so cold I couldn’t cut it.

Happy Review: This is a smart modem hotel on Temple Way. Comfortable room, nice breakfast with lots of choice
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Friendly staff, great welcome, comfortable room and good shower
Unhappy Review: Somewhat noisy airco / heating but was able to turn it off

Happy Review: Good location close to the city centre, helpful and friendly reception staff and good breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Small room  which could have been cleaned better and bed not very comfortable. No lounge to sit and relax in.

Review Title: A great place to stay for central Bristol
Happy Review: A nice, modern hotel. Rooms were comfortable. Location was great for central Bristol and Bristol Temple Meads station. Breakfast was great - really nicely cooked as opposed to other hotels I've stayed at.

Review Title: It was a nice stay in a good location
Happy Review: It's in a good central location. The room was nice, the bathroom was a little small and kind of in a corner with no bath just a shower cubical in the wall but it was sufficient for my needs.
Unhappy Review: Parking is very limited and was full when I arrived at 9pm, I tried calling the hotel for help on where to park but was given directions as if I was a local which I struggled to follow in the dark in my car so I ended up searching for the nearest NCP carpark which was about 10 min walk away in the rain with my bags which wasn't ideal after a long trip to get there.

Happy Review: Central, clean and friendly
Unhappy Review: £20 to park overnight but to be fair it’s very close to the train station!

Happy Review:
Lovely location 
Excellent service and staff very polite
Unhappy Review:
Had an issue with hot water but had a child lock on it . Was sorted out quickly 
The bed was very uncomfortable and made a lot of noises

Happy Review:
Fantastic location , opposite Temple Park and Temple Church. Ten  mins walk to shopping mall and Old city. Friendly helpful staff  with a smile. Clean room. 
Breakfast was basic but fresh. We enjoyed our 2 night stay. Highly recommended.
Unhappy Review: Dinner was awful.  My salmon tasted sour and my partner roast was Bland and dry. Gravy like water with no colour and body to it. Dissapointed!

Review Title: Clean and well appointed room, friendly staff.
Happy Review:
Friendly staff, very clean, well appointed room, easy to park.
Despite being on a very busy main road, it was quiet in the rooms.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast was reasonable but no butter on the first morning and staff (whilst very friendly) didn't keep on top of making sure there was cutlery on tables, plates available at some of the food stations etc. A minor grumble, but some attention to detail lacking. 
Location not the best, on a main road with a fair walk to city centre ( we are happy walking, but others might not be)
Parking expensive - £20 per day.

Happy Review: The staff were very friendly and very helpful.
Unhappy Review: Trying to find my way into the car park took a long time as not signposted that need to go round a load of back streets to get to it.

Happy Review: Great breakfast, comfy bed.
Unhappy Review: Bathroom was on the small side

Review Title: Excellent service and a great location
Happy Review: The bed was so comfy and all the facilities were fine- the room was quite small and for a king room thought we would have a bath
Unhappy Review: No bath

Happy Review: Room was clean and comfortable with a very good en suite. views over the city were good. Staff were very attentive and helpful with an excellent balance between friendliness and professionalism
Unhappy Review: We struggled to find the parking at the hotel but this was probably due to the number of roadworks. Breakfast was a little disappointing as we felt that some of the food had been sitting in the hot buffet too long

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review:
Heating didn’t work.  G
Hotel provided heater and blanket 
Fan stayed on all night - noisy
Restaurant staff were not very engaging - sit anywhere and no more info about where items were or how breakfast service worked.

Happy Review: Very good location
Unhappy Review: That the central heat was not working

Happy Review: Room good
Unhappy Review: How cold breakfast area was and no direction to what was on offer coffee for example was not same place as food.

Happy Review: The room was very clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: People standing round the main door smoking.  Breakfast  was cold. And to far from the town if walking. As my sister had difficultys.

Happy Review: All staff were pleasant.  The lady on reception when we arrived was particularly helpful on several occasions.  The hotel location was ideal for us, being a very short walk from the station and close to a music venue we had tickets for.  Bars and eateries close by too.
Unhappy Review: This was not exactly a big problem or dislike, but it would have been nice to have an electrical socket on both sides of the bed.

Happy Review: Comfortable and clean. Easy to get to from the venue of the wedding we attended.
Unhappy Review: Light in room didn't seem to work but had lamps so didn't bother us.

Happy Review: Great location, friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Rooms a little grubby

Happy Review:
Bar/restaurant is lovely, it’s open plan, the lovely big windows. The entrance is light and airy and smells lovely.
All the staff were great and extremely helpful 
Would defo stay again.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: A good place to stay with friendly & welcoming staff
Happy Review: All staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast spread was good and food quality was perfect. Our room & bathroom were both clean but very small.
Unhappy Review: Room and bathroom size were small
The bar & restaurant was closed both nights

Happy Review: Excellent location near city centre, places of interest and transports.
Unhappy Review: The toilet is too small.

Happy Review: The staff were really helpful. Comfy beds, lovely breakfast
Unhappy Review: No issues

Happy Review: Lovely helpful staff, generally good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Rooms too hot even with AC. Porridge was absolutely vile

Happy Review: Location is good 👍
Unhappy Review: Private function on so no restaurant or bar. They had a table to order drinks in reception but nowhere to sit. No discount for reduced service. Bed was not comfortable, no coffee in room or water.

Happy Review: close to a venue for a concert
Unhappy Review: parking was x10 the price of any parking locations nearby and there's a lot , you expect a mark up but x10 is robbery

Happy Review: The staff was friendly and I generally liked the room. The breakfast buffet offered the perfect start to the day!
Unhappy Review: It was a bit cold in the room. I used the AC as recommended and put it on the hottest temperature, but it was still quite cold and didn't seem to work well (it was a freezing day outside as well).

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Breakfast . The bacon and sausage wasn't very nice

Review Title: Pleasant clean place with very nice staff in an excellent location
Happy Review: Location is excellent
Unhappy Review: Expensive … lunches very expensive

Happy Review: Location, comfortable rooms, friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Limited parking...

Review Title: Good but air con needs sorting out
Happy Review: Very close to town, staff very good
Unhappy Review: Our first room the air con did not work, our next room it worked but not very well

Happy Review: The hole time was good had a lovely evening with my Grand children and then attended his Graduation
Unhappy Review: we thought the price of the meal and drinks were a bit high

Happy Review: Handy location, short walk from the station and to the centre. Staff were friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review:
Small room and bathroom, bed was a bit hard. Seemed more like a travel Inn than a Hilton hotel. Expensive considering size and basic nature of the room (even though it was a Queen room apparently). 
Breakfast area seemed a bit chaotic and rowdy.

Happy Review: The staff were exceptional at this hotel, especially Peter on reception. Great location too!
View of the park
Unhappy Review: I would like a coat hook near the room door.

Review Title: Four of us had a short but very enjoyable stay and would certainly return whenever we are in Bristol
Happy Review: The room was a little small and the bathroom very small. However they included everything necessary and were very clean so nothing to complain about. The breakfast was excellent especially the offer of omelettes and poached eggs to order. A special mention must be made of Ash (Subash?). He went out of his way to ensure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. Exceptional employee.
Unhappy Review: Small size of bathroom but it did have a great magnified mirror. Not enough comfortable chairs in the bar area.

Happy Review: Location and value
Unhappy Review: Prefer bath to showers

Review Title: Overall very happy with our stay.
Happy Review:
Staff very helpful and friendly 
Breakfast choice/omelettes
Clean
Close to station /park
Free overnight parking close by
Unhappy Review: Bed size, previously stayed in room with bigger bed

Happy Review: Clean, comfortable room. Staff changed our room when the temperature in the original one couldn't be reduced. Breakfast good. Very friendly and helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Not possible to reduce temperature in original room.

Review Title: Comfortable hotel best suited for business travellers
Happy Review: I stayed one night for business. The room was fine, clean and comfortable, with tea making facilities in the room. Great breakfast selection and very welcoming staff.
Unhappy Review: Although perfectly comfortable, the room was very beige, with almost office-like furniture. Good for a business trip, but for a leisure visit I would expect more for the price.  The location is not very inspiring, but near the station, which suited my needs.

Happy Review: Location and staff
Near to the station, contemporary decor (lovely smell in the reception areas!), pleasant staff and great breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast layout rather confusing and lots of items had run out

Happy Review: The hotel is in a good location near the station and a short walk into the center of Bristol. The room was clean and comfortable.  The buffet breakfast was very good.  The staff were helpful and friendly.
Good location near station. 10 mins walk into town. Easy check in.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: It was a good location close to old town and harbour with parking

The smell of the hotel was fabulous. there was an atomiser near the lift. smelt gorgeous.
Staff were friendly and helpful
Location was perfect. The waffle maker for breakfast was brilliant. nom
Unhappy Review:
The view from our window was probably the worst we've ever had. building work and scaffolding to building next door.
was a shame, but unavoidable. didn't detract from room particularly as was just a place to rest our heads. 
The coffee machine wasn't working so couldn't easily get a cuppa, then another, as a member of staff had to work the only hot drink machine behind the bar

Review Title: Overall a positive experience, spoiled only by inattentive breakfast staff
Happy Review: The check-in and check-out were very smooth and the gentlemen on reception was extremely helpful and efficient. Room was perfect for what I needed, very clean and comfortable, and the location of the hotel was perfect for my needs. Car parking was also very handy and worked well.
Unhappy Review: Long wait to get a table for breakfast - not because of the lack of tables, but because there was nobody there to attend to the waiting guests. Empty tables were not being cleared and re-set, so when someone did finally take me to a table, I had to wait again while the table was cleared and re-set. The person doing that did not seem to recognise that a lot of people were waiting and did not seem to be in a hurry to get fresh tables ready. For a hotel of this category, I would have expected a lot more.

Happy Review: It was a short walk to the centre of Bristol.
Unhappy Review: The noise from  possibly the lift mechanism or air conditioning unit. We were on the 5th floor next to the elevators.

Happy Review:
Room was fine.
Location excellent for town and railway station 
Breakfast was good
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review:
Great location and parking
Staff were superb. Friendly helpful and food in restaurant, room service and breakfast was great too.
Unhappy Review: Bed was hard for me and also heating didn’t work but we managed to get a heater and extra duvet easily and sorted that out.

Review Title: A good venue, with all what was needed, giving a good base for a quick visit.
Happy Review: The location was good, friendly staff, convenient bar.  Breakfast was decent too.
Unhappy Review: Initially the wrong room was provided; with a double bed instead of 2 singles provided, but this was resolved, although mainly by my colleagues' quick thinking.

Happy Review: The reception staff were brilliant. So helpful and cheerful.
Unhappy Review:
Our Queen Room was beside the lift shaft so was really noisy 24 hours a day which was very annoying. 
Shower room as tiny.

Happy Review: The bedroom is spacious and bright. The toilet has good amenities and lighting. It is good located not too far from the train station. The staff is really friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review: The breakfast is simple and quite depressing. Most of the itens were missing, like pastries and fruits. There were no charcuteries, the bread was old and poor quality. The coffee was decent though

Happy Review:
Friendly reception staff, quick and easy check in
Friendly breakfast catering staff members, decent selection for breakfast
Good room size
Unhappy Review: Non-smart TV

Review Title: Comfortable hotel but some breakfast chaos.
Happy Review: The property had big rooms and was clean.  There were also two decent chairs to sit and watch the TV etc.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast was okay but the tables were often not cleared for new diners and the food stocks had to be asked to replenished but weren’t.

Happy Review: The breakfast was good
Unhappy Review: No information about the local area in the room and a paper menu in the room would have helped.not everyone has a smart phone to scan barcodes

Review Title: Convenient and comfortable. A good overnight stop.
Happy Review: The room was clean and comfortable and the hotel itself was smart and quite conveniently located for walking to the old town. Breakfast was decent, if unexceptional and the price was good. A good option for an overnight stay in Bristol
Unhappy Review:
The hotel could have provided much more helpful information in advance:
1) Access to the hotel by car is complicated (not helped by road works/construction and Google maps thinking you can turn left off Temple Gate where you can't). Last time I stayed in Bristol, the hotel provided detailed driving directions for accessing it from various different directions - something similar would have been helpful.
2) The only information I had from the hotel about parking talked about an option for £20 a day. They omitted to mention the alternative car park 20 seconds walk away that is free overnight, and £2.50 an hour for up to 4 hours. The staff mentioned it, but only when I asked about alternatives if the hotel car park was full.

Happy Review: Really friendly staff, rooms were really nice with lots of storage
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was unorganised. Me and my partner were sat flipped the ‘occupied’ counter provided with the table to get food only to come back to have to ask a couple to move after they’d been sat at our table by staff.

Happy Review: Clean, good staff, good value
Unhappy Review: Coffee machine

Happy Review: The breakfast was okay, short on cups and cutlery, had to ask for items.
Unhappy Review: I think they need the check in for breakfast nearer the door, it was so busy people was just walking in and not queuing to be seated and helping them selves to breakfast, these could have been people whose not paid as they didn’t give a room number.

Happy Review:
Very comfortable
 Great breakfast included in the price
 Lovely staff
Unhappy Review: Car park a little pricey

Happy Review: Convenient location, comfortable room, everyone working there was lovely, and great breakfast.

Review Title: Pleasant overnight stay and made our journey easier for travelling to Devon.
Happy Review: Breakfast was fine, as well as being located beside historic church building and some old public houses from a few hundred years. A difference in the air between the front and back of building.
Unhappy Review: I thought hotel was not near the train station as we needed to get taxi to and from.

Review Title: Was fit for purpose for a one night stay but wouldn't return if there are other options.
Happy Review: Location was handy for the train station. Nice touches in the room like a bath mat all the soaps and gels and fridge. Room was spacious bed was comfortable.
Unhappy Review: It wasn't as modern as would have expected for a Hilton; there was a huge stain on the upholstered desk chair; stains all over the carpets and curtains too. Tea tray was okay but not exciting with no biscuits or fresh milk considering there was a fridge. And I hated having just a QR code for hotel information rather than some paper I could read and keep refer back to. TV half the channels didn't even work and guide was awful.

Happy Review: Staff extremely friendly, all very pleasant.  Nice breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Pillows far too soft.

Review Title: Close to the rail station, not far from the cultural centre by the docks, excellent for short stay
Happy Review: comfortable clean room, the heating system wasn't working adequately but we were provided with a supplementary heater, very good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Everything was either adequate or good, no comnplaints

Review Title: Well located. Friendly staff. Nice rooms
Happy Review: Well located, very close to the train station. The room was  clean and well-sized with comfortable bed. Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Nothing in particular. Maybe slightly overpriced but it’s pretty common lately due to the energy crisis.

Review Title: Very good but could be even better
Happy Review: Very comfortable, no fuss hotel. Helpful staff. Good location for Temple Meads rail station and useful bus connections. Good buffet breakfast. Enjoyed the fitness centre, especially Peloton.
Unhappy Review:
The air conditioning was not very responsive. We had to open the small windows to get some air flow and cool the room but then we had traffic noise from the road. The air con fan was too loud to have on for any length of time. 
 Nowhere to hang damp towels to dry.

Happy Review: Great breakfast included in stay, clean good sized rooms.
Unhappy Review: Car parking pricing at £20/night, but good to have the option.

Review Title: Great location for Bristol city centre and attractions
Happy Review: Great location for the city centre. Easy access to the station on foot and walking distance from the main Bristol attractions.
You get what you expect. Nice and clean hotel with good breakfast and nice staff.
Unhappy Review: Kinda expensive, but worth it.

Review Title: Not as good as a premiere inn
Happy Review: staff were really friendly,
Unhappy Review: no usb in the rooms which were a tad dated

Happy Review: Good location, price, breakfast, clean and bright hotel
Unhappy Review: No functioning air conditioning in very hot room and no alternative rooms available, no parking availability at hotel due to road closure with no prior warning to guests

Happy Review: Great location and welcoming staff.
Nice clean comfy room and great breakfast. Convenient location and good price.

Review Title: Great hotel but lacking info on car park access.
Happy Review:
Nicely appointed room - did not look tired at all.
Not too busy at breakfast. Good central location.
Unhappy Review: Car park is visible along the main road, from which there is no entrance. Surrounding road system affords no real time to stop and think how to get into the car park. Clearer instructions with a postcode to the rear of the hotel would help.

Happy Review: Fab location. Very comfortable room. Excellent choice at the breakfast buffet.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: I would choose this hotel again for sure.
Happy Review: Nice welcome and quality of breakfast. Well thought out room arrangements to squeeze as much as possible into the small space.

Review Title: Great location, great staff unfortuantely let down by a disturbed nights sleep.
Happy Review: The room was good and the staff were excellent - particularly the staff in the restaurant who were very conscientious with our dietary requirements.
Unhappy Review:
Our tv turned on at full volume at 04.29 in the morning.   
This may have been some preset alarm setup by a previous occupant but clearly not ideal.  
If this is an option it would be useful to either turn it off or have the staff reset it each time the room is vacated.
Parking payment. No free breakfast

Happy Review: Handy for the train station and city centre
Unhappy Review: Small room and  expensive

Review Title: Location was convenient and was clean
Happy Review: Location and how clean it was
Unhappy Review: The mattress was uncomfortable, spring bed and not levelled.

Happy Review: Great breakfast

Review Title: Friendly and Polite staff with an excellent welcome factor.
Happy Review:
Good size room and excellent facilities, very comfortable bed.
Ideal location as I travelled by train and the venue for my function was only 5 minutes walk. Not so good walking back late night through the park opposite as there was a distinctive smell of cannabis, would have taken a different route if known but the times we live in, I guess.
Unhappy Review:
I felt that the price was high as the hotel only really compared to other cheaper chain hotels. Yes, the restaurant was better but was only used it for a quick buffet breakfast as I was in Bristol for a function.
Speaking with other people met at the function I would look elsewhere if visiting Bristol again as they appeared to get a better deal financially.

Happy Review: Good breakfast, nice staff. Good location.
Unhappy Review: We got lost on the way from the train station, on foot, and ended up going the back way round a lot of building works. Then discovered how close it was to the station the next day.

Review Title: A very nice place to stay at a reasonable price.
Happy Review: Well designed room, clean, nice controllable temperature, comfortable bed, well lit bathroom, very good breakfast, good location. The rooms at the back overlook a park.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really.

Happy Review: We found the staff so helpful and friendly.  In particular, we had an issue with our booking which Peter resolved beyond our expectations.  Location was also excellent.
Unhappy Review: The bed was a bit too firm.

Review Title: A very enjoyable and comfortable stay.
Happy Review: The staff were very helpful and friendly.
Unhappy Review: Car parking at the hotel is a bit expensive.

Happy Review:
Easy to locate near the train station and tourist areas.
Very welcoming and knowledgeable reception person.
Large comfortable bed. Room good size.
Decor pleasing.
Large coffee cups.
Lift

Review Title: Peter Front of House made our trip as did the Restaurant staff ..
Happy Review: loved the access to Temple Gardens
Unhappy Review: The rooms overlooking the road

Happy Review: Totally good, I like it
good location between train and city centre
Unhappy Review: temperature in restaurant- aggressive aircon

Review Title: Very pleasant (hope this counts as a sentence).
Happy Review: Staff explaining breakfast procedure to me as new Hilton customer.
Unhappy Review: Having a biscuit with the teamaker (!).

Happy Review: Good location, great breakfast, helpful staff, clean room, comfortable beds.

Comfortable, quiet, nice bed and desk.
Friendly staff. Really close to the railway station.
Unhappy Review: More fresh fruit at the breakfast buffet please!

Review Title: Great stay , very poor breakfast though
Happy Review: Everything about it was great to be honest, expect the breakfast was very poor
Unhappy Review: The breakfast was very poor quality,  the bacon was cold, greasy and rock hard, the mushrooms were dried up, the scrambled egg was all dried up, and sausages were cold, all in all very poor standard

Happy Review:
Welcome good, comfortable clean room. No biscuits and after a long Fri e could ha e done with one 
Think overpriced for the one night
Unhappy Review: Pricing not value formoney

Happy Review:
Quite central. Easy to reach city centre and Temple Mead Rail Station. Nice Temple Garden to Victoria Street.
Love the Clean fresh Bath Towels and Bed very comfortable. Room Brightly lit. Ample Coffee and Tea given in room .
Unhappy Review: Room a bit small. The fridge not working. Shower door cannot close properly.

Happy Review: It is a nice hotel in the city centre. Breakfast was good but basic (nothing extravagant, the bread was good though, coffee could be better). We really appreciate the fact that it provide parking possibilities. The staff was friendly and happy to help if needed

Review Title: Well located with easy parking and good value
Happy Review: Parking is very handy, quiet room, breakfast was very good.
Unhappy Review: Queen sized bed was rather small but King-size are available

Happy Review: Staff were amazing. hotel was clean.
Unhappy Review: The mattress was very hard and uncomfortable

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing - all good

Happy Review: Very helpful staff, very clean room
Unhappy Review: Construction view really uncomfortable could not open my curtains for the entire stay. Restaurant was always super busy whenever i was there breakfast and dinner.

Happy Review:
Great location near the train station. 
Staff were friendly
Unhappy Review: Wasn't there long enough. No issues

Happy Review: Excellent price and location, modern hotel, clean room and comfortable bed.
Unhappy Review: Not the most welcoming on arrival at lunchtime. I expected more from a Hilton hotel.
This review has been hidden because it doesn't meet our guidelines.

Happy Review: Room comfortable & excellent breakfast. Also handy for places of interest, shops etc.
Unhappy Review: Tricky to find hotel car park as lots of construction work going on but obviously not fault of hotel.

Happy Review: Super helpful staff. Great breakfast. Perfect location, in between the train station and the city center. Comfortable bed.
Unhappy Review: It's a bit old and outdated, but it's still comfortable. The carpet floors always look a bit dirty, but that's normal in UK.

Review Title: Just right for the purpose of my trip.
Happy Review: The room was spacious and comfy and the bathroom was clean and functional (I liked the fact there was a proper shower rather than an over the bath shower).  The location was a 2 minute walk from my work venue and the variety at breakfast was reasonable.  The staff were excellent.
Unhappy Review: The hotel is in quite a noisy part of Bristol - perhaps some extra sound proofing in rooms would be good as I was woken several times by traffic and other guests just entering/exiting rooms/ the sound of the lift pinging.

Happy Review:
Modern clean hotel in business district 
Cafes and pubs close by
Unhappy Review: A little way out from city centre but bus stop is outside the hotel and the water ferry is a short walk away

Happy Review: Staff was very helpful, breakfast was ok, they have gluten free option.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: The service
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: It was good - too expensive though for one night
Happy Review: Pleasant space overall . Hilton chain best beds …
Unhappy Review: Noisy location. Ambulance sirens main dual carriage way .

Review Title: Comfortable affordable hotel in central bristol
Happy Review: Central location, near the train station, comfortable bed and good Buffett breakfast
Unhappy Review: No complaints

There was building work very close which closed the road leading to the Hilton car park.  Took us 20 minutes to find another way in and had to ask in the end.  The hotel need to advise guests in advance of easier ways to access the car park whilst the building continues.  In fact the whole of Bristol is a building site.

Review Title: Great location for a business trip to Bristol
Happy Review: I had a wonderful stay. The room was big enough for one person and everything was very clean. The bed was comfortable and the walls are not as paper-thin as in many other hotels. I enjoyed the breakfast as well. Although the gym was relatively small, all equipment worked and was clean.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really.

Happy Review:
The room was very clean, the personnel was very polite and helpful. 
The location is a great walking distance from the main train station.
Unhappy Review:
There was a constant noise in the room and it felt like they were doing constructions from outside, which was not the case. 
The room temperature couldn't be adjusted so we woke up with a cold. 
At the entrance, there was a very strong scent/perfume and accelerated our cold :(

Review Title: Exceptional service from all staff members.
Happy Review: Reception staff very helpful at check in and check out. Restaurant staff also give great service. Room rather small but clean and adequate.
Unhappy Review: Room smaller than expected.

Happy Review: Very well located

Review Title: I wish it was longer had to leave personal problems 😞
Happy Review: I only stayed in the room for 2 hours I had to leave family problems 🥺
Unhappy Review: Everything was lovely

Happy Review: Great location for purpose of visit (nearby wedding). Room had a wetroom - brilliant!
Unhappy Review:
The seat within the shower are was dirty, in between its slats. 
I know it's difficult - but cooked breakfast items were cold!

Review Title: Great location, clean and comfortable. Good breakfast and great value for money
Happy Review: Everything was great!
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Excellent choice for access to airport and city centre. Very good customer service - warm friendly staff.
Happy Review: Modern comfortable room with very friendly staff. Room overlooking gardens and old monastery very pleasant. Very convenient for the airport bus!! Breakfast is well worth the money.
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Happy Review: Nice
Unhappy Review: Car park charge

Happy Review: How walkable the distance was from the station and softness of bed and cushions
Unhappy Review: Shower went cold quite easily when used late in the morning.

Happy Review: Great location, private car park, clean room, delicious breakfast, etc... Staying at Hilton is always a good idea...
Unhappy Review: N/A

Happy Review:
near train and Wetherspoons Knights Temple.  Busses handy.  staff helpful
thanks.
Unhappy Review: no non-slip patch in bath under the shower.

Happy Review: Staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was nice.
Unhappy Review: Cost of parking was a little excessive. Forgot to ensure there was no feather duvets or pillows in the rooms. However, this was soon rectified and we were given a drink as compensation.

Review Title: Despite the problems accessing the hotel and parking the car, the hotel itself was very good.
Happy Review: Staff were very friendly. Very good breakfast.
Unhappy Review: I spent 30 minutes going around in cirlces trying to find the way into the hotel car park to get to reception. In the end I had to drop my wife off to go to the hotel on foot and then make 2 turnings that I was not supposed to make. On arrival it was explained that I should have gone through the archaway marked "Novotel Car Park Only". Easier access and plentiful, clear direction signs need to be provided. Parking was difficult due to the limited spaces in the hotel, so I had to park in the council car park and then pay a charge by 8am next morning, until a space became available in the hotel car park (£20 for 24 hours). Not a great system!

Happy Review: Location of hotel is good.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast tables were not cleared quick enough. we were told to find a table and there were not any clean ones, we had to ask for them to be cleared.

Happy Review: Clean room, comfy bed, very nice bathroom
Unhappy Review: Would be nice to see some biscuits/ snacks on the tea tray.

Happy Review: The breakfast was very nice with a good range of options and the receptionist welcoming me was very kind.
The location was  convenient.  The breakfast was good.
Unhappy Review: it would be better if the double room could be providedwuth  two chairs instead of one .

Happy Review: Liked the location, breakfast and staff prompt response. I had an issue relating to Air conditioner in my room at late night, But a big thanks to Sasha from the reception team who instantaneously organized a replacement room and moved me into a new room.
Unhappy Review: Although the hotel has a car park, the spaces seem limited. To me that was a thing but anyone who doesn’t think this as issue wouldn’t be bothered.

Review Title: We have a pleasant stay. We will return if the chance arises.
Happy Review: There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel, so it's easy for us to go to the centre of the city. It's rather close to the train station as well. We arrived at Bristol by train, and it took us about 5~7 minutes to walk to the hotel (with our heavy luggage behind). We didn't try the breakfast, but we had dinner at the hotel restaurant. The atmosphere in the restaurant is pleasant, and the food is good (we ordered some hot soup, salad, and Buffalo wings). I would like to compliment the ones who cleaned our room for treating my plushie with care.
Unhappy Review: The room is small, but with this affordable price, it's good enough. I have one complaint about the fridge in our room. We weren't sure if the fridge was working or broken, but it wasn't cold enough to store our ice cream and yoghurt. I hope that it will be fixed or improved.

Happy Review: Location was great, 6min walk from the station and tesco express nearby. Room was lovely and the staff made towel swans which was a nice touch. Great value for money and would definitely stay again.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast wasn’t great- sausages and bacon seemed like they had been out for a a while.

Happy Review: Lovely breakfast with a large selection of food and even a waffle making machine to make fresh waffles with a range of toppings. Can request eggs how you like them cooked and can request veggie option sausages too for breakfast. Staff was very friendly and very helpful so a BIG THANK YOU! Shower was amazing with lovely soaps and body lotions

Review Title: A good location and price for my short visit.
Happy Review: Location and room were good for my brief visit
Unhappy Review: Some areas of the hotel need improvement but generally good value.

Review Title: Ideal location for a short break in Bristol.
Happy Review: The location of this hotel is ideal, a few minutes walking distance from both Temple Meads Bus/Train Station and the city centre. A very good breakfast is served, with plenty of choices. We were able to leave our luggage at reception on the morning of our departure and collect it that evening as we had a late flight.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: comfortable room, good location

Review Title: Better than expected stay & good value off-weekend
Happy Review: The staff at checkin were very friendly, and gave me a room that I asked for facing the garden. Thus my room was nice and quiet, with negligible from traffic noise until after 7am. The bed is comfortable and it's great to have both a kettle and a mini fridge. The included breakfast was very good, with nicely cooked poached eggs to order. The location is very convenient both for the railway station but also lovely walks along the Harbour area.
Unhappy Review: Only tiny things were an annoyance: even when off there is a low hum from the air conditioning and the room could do with more plugs at the bedside for charging phones and other equipment. Finally, it would be nice to have a better assortment of herbal tea bags, such as chamomile and peppermint, rather than predominantly regular tea

Review Title: perfect for a night to stay, if for more days, I would prefer to have a place more quiet
Happy Review: great breakfast choices, clean and comfy room
Unhappy Review: location was okay, but the noise of the street/cars were a little anoying
lack of parking

Review Title: Great hotel for a city break.
Happy Review: The location was a 5 minute walk from the railway station. Pedestrian friendly. Check-in was speedy and efficient. A special mention for Nikita who checked us in and was more then helpful with the choice of room. The hotel was 10minutes walk away form the Old Town. Lots of history and great bars and eateries. So much to choose from. Breakfast was self service and plentiful with a good selection of food. Our room was small but very comfortable.
Unhappy Review: More Tea Bags in the room.

Review Title: Outstanding staff, thank you everyone. Owners could invest in some renovations
Happy Review: The staff was the best thing about the location. Everyone was so accommodating and friendly. Peter stood out, he’s a manager or boss or something, and he’s leading by example. Also, the food was outstanding. The chicken and rice dish was amazing, don’t remember the name of it.
Unhappy Review: Not to be attributed to the staff, but the hotel could use some renovations. I imagine that’s up to the owners. There’s a particular smell throughout the hallway, but the room was excellent and clean. The furniture is not amazing, as it’s a bit older, but the cleaning staff did their job very well.

Happy Review: Parking is awful. You allow people to park in no parking zones

This is a modern hotel with everything that you’d expect. The bed was spacious and extremely comfortable, breakfast in the morning had a very good selection, and all of the staff that we interacted with were helpful and friendly, especially Annie(?) at the front desk. A late check-out and storage of bags were offered, rather than asked for.
Unhappy Review: Good city location near Temple Meads, but, that also means you’re close to a busy road.

Review Title: Air conditioning in room didn’t work, although we were offered a fan it was very hot and we couldn’t have the window ope
Happy Review: Good location for rail link, good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Not close to amenities

Happy Review: Good breakfast. Clean room with comfy beds.
Unhappy Review: My son was locked in his room after the door failed to open from inside. It took over an hour as we were told we would have to wait for a locksmith to arrive. The staff on reception were useless and most unhelpful given the circumstances as was the hotel manager when we asked for an explanation for how this could happen. He never even apologised! Very disappointing in terms of health and safety..

Happy Review: Very Central, everything In walking distance

Review Title: perfect location for a relaxing quiet city break
Happy Review: the room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast was good quality but the notable point for  me was the friendliness of the staff who were very obliging also there is a nice small park across the road and the hotel is walking distance from temple meads train station where the airport flyer bus stops
Unhappy Review: all good

Happy Review: Great location. Clean and comfortable room.
East central location with onsite parking (although you have to pay for it)
Unhappy Review: Small fridge
Xarpet was badly stained in bedroom

Happy Review: It’s location
Unhappy Review: Cost of parking

Review Title: Good time with young and old.
Happy Review: Easy walking distance from the train station, even for my elderly parents. Also, many walkable places to visit. We went to Bath by train for a day out too.
Unhappy Review: The room was a little warm for me and the AC didn't cool it enough.

Happy Review: Reasonable room with functional bathroom and shower.
Unhappy Review: Position, easy walk into the city centre.

Happy Review: N/a
Unhappy Review: N/a

Happy Review: Breakfast was good thanks. I'm gluten intolerant, the staff were helpful in providing me with toast & cereal which I don't often find in other hotels or bnbs.
Unhappy Review: Not enough decaffeinated tea bags in  room. Shower was. Not easy to regulate, either too hot or cold.

Review Title: Good overnight stop for the airport.
Happy Review: Good location for Airport Flyer bus from Temple Meads station to airport. Clean room, bed a little hard, very quiet.
Unhappy Review: Dinner limited menu but satisfactory, breakfast good choice but cooked food tepid.

Review Title: Nice clean hotel would stay again.
Happy Review: Good clean hotel good selection for breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Rooms abit small especially the bathroom.

Happy Review: Nice walk to the centre and river, good breakfast, excellent Sardinian restaurant a short stroll across the square
Unhappy Review: Room not the biggest

Happy Review: Great location, comfortable room.
Unhappy Review:
Trying to find the entrance to the carpark was very difficult due to current roadworks, so new temporary signage is desperately required.
Breakfast food quality wasn’t great.

Happy Review:
Very welcoming and helpful staff. 
Short walk from the station.
Unhappy Review: Although the breakfast was well prepared and presented the quality of the ingredients didn’t match the Hilton of old.

Review Title: Convenient for trains and buses, sadly wouldn’t stay again
Happy Review: Very clean
Unhappy Review:
Chair with broken arms (dangerous) in room
Absolutely NO info in room, eg restaurant menu, breakfast times etc
Restaurant not busy but we didn’t get our starter!
Extortionate price for tiny bottle of tonic water £3.35!
No complimentary water in the room.

Happy Review:
Friendly staff, although the chef at breakfast came across a little bit annoyed when I made a small and honest mistake like I’m some sort of child. Seems like a nice guy though, but he could have handled that better.
The hotel was close to the station which makes it easy to get to another place and back. The location is nice and the price is the best amongst all competition. 
The breakfast was nice, lots of options, but in my opinion also a bit simple. 
All in all it’s very much worth your money, I’ve enjoyed it very much staying there. If you are just looking for a nice and easy place to stay, this is a great option. But if you want to make your stay a bit more special, maybe go for another hotel.
Unhappy Review: It’s a little bit of an old hotel, not really modern. Could be charming but you don’t expect it at Hilton’s.

Review Title: Positive experience and would book again.
Happy Review: Bedroom was a good size with comfortable bed.very clean.  All the staff were amazing, so friendly and willing to help.  Breakfast was good.
Unhappy Review: Only thing I would have preferred is to have a bath as well as a shower.

Happy Review: Comfortable rooms, great location.
Unhappy Review: Expensive parking. Restaurant menu limited. Food very average, service rather uneven’

Happy Review: It was lovely and clean
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Good value for money, would stay again
Happy Review: Room was good value, staff were very helpful when asked anything, breakfast was ok.
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast lacked basic continental products,ie no yoghurt, no butter, only flora margarine, no croissants,
Also no tomato with the cooked breakfast,slow to replenish the cooked items, so you were waiting with plate in hand with your breakfast going cold,waiting for items to be replenished

Happy Review: The room was clean mostly.
Unhappy Review:
The toilet didn't flush properly. Took about 3 or 4 flushes each time.
Very noisy from road traffic and seagulls. Parking was expensive. Breakfast was all over the place, couldn't find what I wanted right away.  By the time I got coffee, my breakfast was cold.

Happy Review: Friendly staff, fridge in room, powerful shower, good location
Unhappy Review: Noise levels from other guests, bathroom too small to dry yourself so had to go into bedroom to do that, too many chairs blocking the room which was fairly small. There was a cracked sink and peeling ceiling in the bathroom. A better variety of tea and coffee making facilities would have been nice for the price. It was very basic and the one teabag I did use tasted like it was very old. The cooked breakfast was not good and the berry juice I had was incredibly sugary. More fresh options would have been better it all felt very cheap on the breakfast front which was a shame as the staff were very nice there

Happy Review: good choice of food and drinks at breakfast and the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Room was in a good location and was very clean with lovely fluffy towels, toiletries. Even had an ironing board and iron available in the room.
Unhappy Review: trying to find the hotel wasn't easy using satnav.

Happy Review:
Breakfast was lovely. Staff at the Recess were very courteous and efficient. Housekeeping staff very hardworking and good at their job.
Love the gym, had basic equipments for workouts. Love that they kept clean towels for use during workout and hydration and sanitation stations.
Unhappy Review: We flew into Bristol at 11am and knew check in was 3pm, the hotel was able to keep our bags for us which was nice. But, when we came back at 3pm, the room wasn't ready and we had to wait for more than 30 minutes.

Happy Review: Rooms were nice, good location for shops and train station
Unhappy Review: We had 2 rooms. One room air con was good mother room so hot! But they did bring us a fan which helped hugely

Review Title: Really enjoyed our stay a great hotel with lovely staff & excellent facilities we would recommend.
Happy Review:
Location excellent 
Quiet when indoors 
Modern facilities 
Clean
Excellent value
Friendly,  helpful,  polite staff
Breakfast was plentiful & good quality, the staff in the dining room were exceptional
Unhappy Review:
Room was a little small for 2 mature females who need access especially around wardrobe & desk area. 
We will request a slightly more spacious room next time.

Review Title: Beautiful hotel with friendly and helpful staff
Happy Review:
Beautiful hotel, smart and clean with good parking facilities. 
Gentleman on reception was amazing and helpful, wish I could remember his name.
Went out of his way to help me with my daughter's graduation.
Unhappy Review:
One of the rooms I was given was right next to the lift (didn't get this room until after 9pm) and it was not until my younger daughter had got undressed and ready for bed and switched the air conditioning off that I realised you could hear the lift.  It did keep me awake most of the night, but as my daughter was asleep I couldn't wake her up to move.  I had asked for quiet rooms away from the lifts and stairs (I had two rooms).
Also no tomatoes at breakfast, although everything else was good.

Review Title: Clean hotel, friendly staff and good location.
Happy Review: Good location near Bristol Temple Meads station and clean rooms.
Unhappy Review: Nothing all good.

Happy Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly.
Unhappy Review:
Our aircon didn’t work we asked but couldn’t be fixed but we didn’t get asked if we wanted to move it was very very hot! 
I asked for a low room due to a knee injury and this wasn’t taking in I even reminded them on arrival. We were second floor and I had to walk half way down the hallway. 
There was loose nails/carpet tacks? Not sure what’s they are called between bathroom and bedroom and I cut my feet multiple times. 
Glasses weren’t clean fridge wasn’t cold.

Review Title: Very good, great location and very quiet in the rooms despite being very busy
Happy Review:
Very clean room And bathroom, the Egyptian cotton towels were exceptionally soft and white. 
Breakfast was fantastic with a huge selection of food types and the coffee was superb.
Unhappy Review:
It’s a very busy hotel so obviously gets a lots of wear and tear. The paintwork
And woodwork is starting to show sign a of this but nothing untoward…
One thing that does need addressing is the way all the dirty linens and towels
Are Left on corridors way after cleaning times and into the evening. Looks
Unsightly and is actually a bit of a hazard.

Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Couldn’t find so had to call. No food late in evening.

Happy Review: The mirrors and bathroom
Helpfully & happy staff,great location.
Unhappy Review: Air con in room was not sufficient as even on a wet weekend the room was too warm.

Happy Review: The room is really clean and the staff are super friendly.

Review Title: OK, pleasant enough, but not memorable.
Happy Review: Location was handy for the station and the staff were very welcoming and friendly.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was OK, but a little underwhelming.  Generally felt we could have done a bit better at a Premier Inn.

Happy Review: Proximity.  Lovely staff.
Unhappy Review:
When I booked it said I’d been upgraded but that didn’t seem to be the case as room was nice but quite basic.  Bathroom small.  
I paid £159 and on day the cost was much cheaper on booking.com.

Happy Review: Nothing stood out
Unhappy Review: Nothing stood out

Happy Review: Well equipped.  Lovely soft pillows.  Good choice at breakfast.  They will make your eggs how you like.. I had an incredible omlette!
Unhappy Review: Very strong smell of aftershave scented air freshener in lifts and corrdors etc.  Breakfast area very spread out and un-cordinated.  Waffle maker not working (but other choices available).

Review Title: Loved the location but hotel very impersonal
Happy Review: Location and comfortable
Unhappy Review: Drinks in bar very expensive, food very average

Happy Review: Very pleasant receptionists
Unhappy Review: Fresh coffee at breakfast would be nice the machine coffee was awful

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Breakfast poor over cooked

Happy Review: Reasonable room good location and if you manage to get a car parking spot it is helpful and a lot cheaper than most other car parks.
Unhappy Review: You cannot book a car park spot in advance. The Bar area was not great. Lifts got very busy at peak times so we walked to our room.

Happy Review: Superb room, very clean and in good condition.  Very quiet despite being in the City centre.  Very comfy bed with good quality linen and thick towels.

Location great
Parking ok.... paid car park very close as limited spaces at actual hotel
Staff friendly and helpful
Room very clean
Unhappy Review:
Breakfast very average 
Bed not very comfortable
I’d prefer a different way to pay for parking. £20 for 24 hours but only parked overnight. Either charge per night or allow partial payment

Happy Review: Waited 15min for a table
Clean, comfortable rooms, excellent breakfast, great staff and lovely bar
Unhappy Review: Rooms are very small

Happy Review: Rooms a little dated but nice hotel
Unhappy Review: Rooms and decor

Happy Review: Perfectly located for the train station amd city centre, clean amd efficient as always. We have stayed here a few times before and will do again!
Great location and very clean. Room was a good size and had a lovely view.
Unhappy Review: Bathroom too small and sink was way too close to the shower. There was also no plug socket on one side of the bed.

Happy Review: Location was very good and Hotel facilities very good.  Helpful friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast seating, had to wait for 15 minutes for table , arrived around 9.30. Staff though were helpful and kept us informed about the table availability.

Review Title: All good. No Complaints at all.
Happy Review: No complaints at all. Perfect for 1 night in Bristol. Thanks.

Good location.  Right by the park and ride stop, which was very convenient and  much cheaper and better than paying the onsite parking fee.  Breakfast very nice. Staff friendly and helpful. Hotel clean but felt very basic.
Unhappy Review: Twin beds not full size, narrow and uncomfortable. Just a king bed unzipped, which we had to wait for despite booking and checking via unanswered messages.  Small and basic bathroom. Small and very basic reception area. I did expect more from a Hilton Hotel, to be honest.

Review Title: It was a very good stay so frustrating that we were charged twice by the restaurant.
Happy Review: It was comfortable, clean and convenient to the station.
Unhappy Review: The restaurant charged our bank account twice for one meal which is frustrating when travelling.

Happy Review: Convenient location and quiet
Unhappy Review: Long queue to check in and inability to reserve parking space.  Plus car covered in tree sap.

Happy Review: Location was very good.

Easy walking distance from Bristol Temple Meads, which was very handy when arriving late at night after a flight from Belfast. Breakfast was pretty solid; it was a rather cold morning, so the porridge was very welcome.
Room great size and bathroom very clean. Breakfast was good. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: A/C was noisy and couldn't turn it off. The tv didn't work and there were no rooms to move to

Review Title: Affordable but high quality of stay.
Happy Review: Location, breakfast.

Review Title: Very nice location and enjoyable stay in Bristol
Happy Review:
The staff were very helpful. Rooms were clean. Location was quiet. The breakfast was good with a nice selection. 
It is easy to walk to the city centre & river. Car parking was useful albeit limited spaces & £20:00 fee for 24 hours..  Bristol is a very interesting city to visit. We enjoyed our brief stay.  
We would recommend this hotel.
Unhappy Review: Due to developments in the area, there are a number of diversions. I found it quite tricky getting to the car park, the SAT NAV kept asking to to turn down NO ENTRY roads !   There are trees that overhang the car park. In the summer these deposit sticky sap - so be be prepared to give your car a good wash when you get home! That is a minor point, not intended to be negative regarding the quality of this hotel.

Review Title: Lovely and what I needed for one night stay
Happy Review: Staff were wonderful and I felt safe :)
Unhappy Review: Decor looks a little tired, marks on wall and carpet and air con was very noisy it kept waking me up

Happy Review:
Room was comfortable and breakfast was tasty with lots of choice! 
Great bar and outside seating area over- looking a green park area. 
Comfortable bed and good shower!
Unhappy Review:
Shower door would not stay fully closed. 
Not many parking spaces so had to park in another car park.

Review Title: Good location and staff, room not great
Happy Review: Reception staff (esp the older chap)
Unhappy Review:
This room was supposed to be an upgrade by booking.com but was on par with Travelodge.
No USBs in room
Room too warm even with a/c lowest temp setting
Not enough tea bags or milk
No biscuits!

Happy Review: Location and breakfast great
Unhappy Review: A bit out dated and building works going on

Happy Review: The hotel was a five minute walk from the  station . The breakfast was very good and the staff very friendly and helpful  .
Unhappy Review: Twin bedded room had only one chair , one shower cap and was rather cramped . It would have been nice to have two bottles  of water in the room in addition to the teas and coffees .

Happy Review: Excellent room, excellent breakfast.

Review Title: Really enjoyed our weekend hope to come back one day.
Happy Review: easy reach to buses and train station as we came up by train and left the car at home.
Unhappy Review: The dining a bit overpriced and drinks were expensive

Review Title: comfortage, nice friendly staff especially breakfast staff, great location
Happy Review: location great , breakfast amazing!
Unhappy Review: check in time not early enough.

Review Title: good. had a very positive experience and would love to come here and do buisness with you again
Happy Review: bed
Unhappy Review: cleaner walked in when we was sleeping

Happy Review: Everything was satisfactory
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Happy Review: good Facilities￼
Unhappy Review: the bed was a little firm to my liking

Review Title: just absolutely amazing and a really clean hotel
Happy Review: I just like it was clean and the staff where absolutely amazing. phone then night before about having wine and strawberries and they went out of their way to deliver that. I was really happy with my stay would go back again
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Friendly staff, good food, great location for my office/station

Review Title: Overall lovely location and room.  Would go again.
Happy Review: Breakfast very good.  Location great as near train station, pretty park and 10 mins to the riverside and shops. Staff friendly.
Unhappy Review: The dinner in the evening was very expensive and limited choice on evening menu.  No entertainment.

Happy Review: Great value for money
Clean tidy and staff very helpful
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Overal it was a good place to stay over
Happy Review: Good
Unhappy Review:
Bacon served was too salty 
Parking spaces was not good and asked to pay for  parking on arrival not aware of that.

Review Title: Great Location for a short stay
Happy Review: Great location, friendly staff, great wifi, very clean
Unhappy Review:
The shower was slightly awkward to get into for someone over 6ft in height!
a vending machine would be handy for drinks etc

Review Title: really lovely hotel that suited us all for the weekend break
Happy Review: very central, great parking, really clean and lovely staff
Unhappy Review: ladies toilets in  foyer out of order

Happy Review: Perfect location... 10 mins walk from station.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: Ideal short stay, central location. Can’t fault it.
