Happy Review: Staff perfectly attentive and friendly. Bar and restaurant modern, clean and food lovely
Great location, a warm and friendly welcome at check in, comfortable room.
Room was very good and view of the park was nice.
Unhappy Review: Noisy air conditioning

Happy Review: Location within walking distance of railway station and town centre. Guest laundry.
Unhappy Review: Hot (only warm) water in shower kept going cold then warm.

Happy Review:
Clean tidy room.lovely toiletries.
Air con very much appreciated.
Staff great
Close to central areas and Temple Meads
Unhappy Review: Lack of vegan options on menus..

Happy Review: Kind welcoming, excellent bed, large room (overclassed !), close to the train station. Sense of detail in everything.
Unhappy Review: Air condition command seemed unefficient, so the room was too hot for me ; opening the window was no option considering the noisy street.

Review Title: was a short getaway, and the staff were excellent.
Happy Review:
it was near Temple Meads Station. 
good location.
very clean .
Unhappy Review: N/A

Happy Review: Staff were lovely and helpful, really nice bar and great location.
Unhappy Review: A little expensive for 1 night

Review Title: Fantastic hotel, very clean and very welcoming staff, we will return
Happy Review: Great staff, great hotel and location, very clean and great facilities, loved the bar and the outside area
Unhappy Review: Room was extremely hot even with air conditioning, £20 for parking was a a little extreme when you have already paid for a room

Happy Review: location and parking on site. Friendly staff . Anne from reception came out and down the street to direct us to the hotel because road closures meant that the route was blocked, we were really grateful to her for this.
Unhappy Review: parking is expensive. Make sure you pay clean air tax - not very clear notices about this and could end up in a hefty fine !

Happy Review: Great choice for breakfast. room comfy big and clean. check in quick and easy.
Unhappy Review: nothing all good

Happy Review: The staff were friendly and helpful.
Staff was extremely welcoming and helpful at all times. Location excellent. Garden behind the hotel, a gem.

A nice hotel from brand, but has not much personality:
- Very clean
- Sound insulation is good, was quite in room, counting fact that windows were reaching big road
- Location is good: very close to train station, kinda border of city center, but Bristol is small, so everything were reachable by foot
- Nice park near hotel
Unhappy Review:
- Typical english breakfast could be more rich with fruits and vegetables
- Food was the same everyday
- Room is pretty small only 12 sqm
- Asked slippers two times, got second pair only on second attempt

Happy Review: The bar was really nice.
The location was good and staff members were friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: There were certain items missing during Monday morning breakfast (fruit yogurt - there was only plain yogurts, not the same fresh fruit selection etc.) Also the croissants were not properly baked - there was raw dough in the middle of the pastry.

Review Title: Great short stay to see a Gig at the Fleece
Happy Review:
Excellent stay.
Nice staff and food very good.
Unhappy Review: Additional cost for parking but I guess that’s standard now.

Review Title: Comfortable stay but access not straightforward
Happy Review:
Room was compact but sufficient for a one night stay. Handy for the city centre and train station.
Breakfast was all self-service and plentiful.
Unhappy Review: Difficult to access by car as the postcode/satnav just leaves you on the main road from where the hotel is not accessible. It's necessary to arrive via the backstreets from where it is not signposted and all complicated by building works in the neighbourhood leading to road closures. Only after booking did I receive a message saying that there was limited parking at the hotel on a first come first served basis and that it would cost £20, which wasn't apparent when booking. Stayed on a Sunday night, so fortunately did get a space at the hotel.

Happy Review: It was lovely
Unhappy Review: Staff were lovely
Air con wouldn't turn off, shower door wouldn't close properly

Happy Review: staff, location, gym, pillows
Unhappy Review: bed not comfy , rooms could do with modern decor

Review Title: Good location, nice room - Brilliant staff.
Happy Review: The location was the main attraction, 5-minute walk from harbour-side. Also great breakfast and staff. The room needed some TLC in the bathroom but it was perfectly clean!
Unhappy Review: Rooms are due an update but they are as clean as they can be and very comfortable. All communal areas are updated and nice to be in.

Happy Review: staff and great breakfast options
Unhappy Review: a bit overpriced

Happy Review: What you would expect from a Hilton.
Unhappy Review: First morning at breakfast restaurant absolutely choc-a-bloc wine 3 group tours in hotel. Was unable to get breakfast until after 9am.( Hotel already knows of this problem from their own survey request)

Happy Review: Staff were extremely lovely and dealt with our requests with no complaints. Beds were super comfy, location is pretty good, and the bar in the evening time is a really great space.
Unhappy Review: Our bathroom ceiling was peeling off and our plug was broken, so water didn't filter down the sink. It was manageable because we went out in the daytime and maintenance had sorted it by then but it would've been an even better stay if the plug wasn't broken.

Happy Review: Comfortable quiet room
Unhappy Review: Very small ensuite shower room

Review Title: Highly recommend this hotel if you need a place to stay near the railway station
Happy Review:
The staff were lovely.
There was good variety at breakfast, including make your own waffles.
The room was small but had everything I needed and was very clean.
There was no parking on site, as it was full, but the staff directed me to a car park literally opposite the entrance and it worked out cheaper to park there.
Unhappy Review: I liked everything.

Happy Review:
Location
Great breakfast

Review Title: Comfortable & well placed near Temple Meads but make sure you don't get the room next to the gym.
Happy Review: Staff really welcoming and helpful. Room and hotel was clean and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Woken abruptly at 7am by banging/thudding noise that went on intermittently for 20-30min. Turns out it was a guy in the hotel gym directly opposite my room slamming a dumb-bell into the ground.

Review Title: Fresh, Clean, Superb Stay for a Singleton!
Happy Review: Room was tidy, clean and quiet. Bed was comfy. Bathroom was clean and bright with nice smelling toiletries and fluffy towels. TV and remote worked and plenty of channels. Coffee bar in bedroom was nice with quiet boiling kettle. Desk and chair were great. Breakfast was lovely--easy instructions to use the waffle maker, which tables were vacant/occupied and where to get drinks. Surrounded by office buildings (quiet on weekends but gave a professional vibe).
Unhappy Review: Could have been more fresh fruit available at breakfast. Elevator chimer bell could have been turned off or on silent during the night (like 23:00-7:00) as rooms near the elevator could hear the elevator bell during those times. Ran out of pastries at breakfast and they weren't replenished quickly.

Review Title: The parking should be free  as the price of the stay is getting dearer
Happy Review: Breakfast and location

Excellent location, very close to the train station and walking distance to restaurants, shops, etc
Great staff, very friendly and helpful!
Excellent breakfast
Very clean hotel and smelt beautiful, staff were very helpful
Unhappy Review: Breakfast wasn't cooked quite enough but a nice selection.

Review Title: Good hotel but noisy location and poor A/C
Happy Review: Clean, modern and tidy. Car parking outside. Nice bar, food and a quiet outdoor verandah to enjoy a drink on rattan sofas. Service was excellent.
Unhappy Review:
Too near a busy main road and traffic noise from 4am even with windows shut. Rear rooms are available though. A/C was poor, the controller didn’t work as per the instructions and the fan noise was on and off all night and the room cooled a little but it was stuffy. Uncomfortable sleep.
It’s not really near a good choice of restaurants or bars and a taxi is required.
The extra service charge added to restaurant service.

Happy Review: Excellent breakfast service - location is great for centre of city
location
Unhappy Review: bed a bit hard and not enough pillows

Happy Review: This is a good business hotel in the developing area of the city towards Temple Meads. We chose the Hilton Garden rather than our usual Hilton Double Tree on the basis of a free breakfast and a room upgrade. The breakfast was fine. I think the room upgrade consisted of a larger bed in a normal sized room, and as a result we found the room and bathroom a bit cramped compared with the Hilton Doubletree which is an older hotel. But overall it was a good place to stay. The outlook from the restaurant, over the Temple Gardens, was particularly pleasant.
Unhappy Review: Our room, at the from of the hotel, faced onto the dual carriageway Temple Way and traffic noise was noticeable at certain times.

Happy Review: Room was very clean, staff were friendly, and professional, breakfast was amazing!!
The hotel is situated very close to the central part of Bristol, it's easy to get anywhere from it. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Parking - we were told we had to pay for a 24-hour stay at the car park, there was even a sign at the reception. However, the parking does not belong to the hotel and we only found out after leaving that we could have paid far less, given that the car didn't even stay there for 12 hours.

Happy Review: 5 minute walk to station for airport bus
Unhappy Review: bar

Happy Review: Bedroom ok
Unhappy Review: Cost too high  .difficult access to the car park needs sign posting to get into car park

Happy Review: restaurant
Unhappy Review:
the bed was uncomfortable 
lumpy

Review Title: We travelled in a group of 6 and we all said we would be happy to use this hotel again.
Happy Review:
Staff were friendly and efficient.
The location worked perfectly.
The standard of cleanliness was very good.
Unhappy Review:
Building work noise ( but no fault of the hotel )
Rather a lack of places to sit that were not In restaurant.
The door key cards were hit and miss at working - however staff were always quick to respond.

Review Title: last minute booking for a weekend stay with good experience
Happy Review: breakfast spread are good . and the staff customer service are superb. Parking is charged at 20GBP which is standard for this location/area.
Unhappy Review: despite the new look, i feel the hotel interior are kind old fashion. i,e: no USB charging point near the bed.

Happy Review: staff / cleanliness
Unhappy Review: bed was very creaky

Happy Review: Very friendly receptionist
Unhappy Review: Price!

Happy Review: Very friendly and helpful staff. Good breakfast. 10/15 minutes walk to city centre
Unhappy Review: Nothing to dislike

Happy Review: Staff were very professional and helpful
Unhappy Review: Size of room and especially toilet room

Happy Review: Staff were great, lobby was lovely. Good access.

There were black marks all up a wall and paint peeling off the ceiling above the shower and a bunch of lights didn't work, but it served its purpose!
Parking was annoying.

Review Title: Lovely room, lovely view, dodgy shower.
Happy Review: Staff were amazing. Room was bright, beautiful, clean and lovely view of the park.
Unhappy Review:
The shower wasn't great. Would just point towards the door even if you tried to move it and got everything wet.
Bathroom floor was ice cold.
provide single beds if possible.

Review Title: Great location , friendly staff , bit pricy
Happy Review: Friendly staff , great location , comfortable rooms
Unhappy Review: We thought that £9 for two coffees was a bit steep

Review Title: A pleasant stop over, an ice change to pop to the shopping centre….
Happy Review: Kids loved the waffle machine in the breakfast room we enjoyed luxury of King room and location was great!

Review Title: Central location - well placed for a city break.
Happy Review: Great location and friendly staff throughout hotel, plus an excellent breakfast.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Review Title: A great place to stay for a short visit.
Happy Review: Room was great, slept well. Quiet and comfortable and with a good shower. Compact but good value for the location. Breakfast, included in our room rate, was excellent. Fresh and warm croissants and a good hot breakfast buffet with omelettes cooked to order, waffles and cold buffet items also available, plus decent coffee from a machine. Staff were very attentive, friendly and efficient. The property and the room was really clean which is a plus.
Unhappy Review: No dislikes but mattress was a little hard otherwise everything else was comfortable.

Happy Review: The staff were very friendly and the location perfect.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really.

Happy Review:
great location - close to the train and the city centre
everything you need
good breakfast
Unhappy Review: the outside of the building seems too 'old' / industrial - but very minor. The inside is fine.

Happy Review: superb room and facilities
Unhappy Review: not a lot of tv channels

Review Title: Will definitely stay with Hilton again 👍🏻
Happy Review: The breakfast was exceptional! Had a fab wake up coffee and made my own waffles. The room is quiet and I slept through the night comfortably. All staffs are very attentive and friendly.

Review Title: comfortable hotel at a good price and good location
Happy Review: super location, helpful staff, smart rooms, brilliant breakfast
Unhappy Review: parking was almost an issue but they sorted it for us

Happy Review: amazing afternoon and night staff. Rooms are tired looking but comfortable beds. The breakfast staff absolutely amazing work and cooking done well.
Unhappy Review: It is interesting that the charge for breakfast at the hotel is more around £12.00 and booking.com reflects £10.00. The £10.00 should be applied regardless.

Happy Review: Location, hair conditioner and other hygiene properties in the bathroom, perfect breakfast
Unhappy Review: Missing toilet brush

Happy Review: The room was comfy, and all the staff, restaurants, services, etc, too. Everything was almost perfect, but there was one problem.
Unhappy Review: The room door was annoying because it didn't open the door easily.  We asked in the reception to change the card door, and they did but still with the same problem.

Review Title: The staff were excellent and accomodating. However, our linen had holes in it, which was concerning.
Happy Review: As a whole, the hotel is relatively clean and in an easily accessible location.
Unhappy Review: There was a smell of fish when walking from the ground floor to first floor for most of our stay at the hotel.

Review Title: couldn’t get parking space . even though we’d paid for it. we did get a refund . the meal wasn’t value for money.
Happy Review: lovely
Unhappy Review: the car parking wasn’t great

Review Title: it was short and sweet, shared a twin room with my daughter who is 19 so space was a little tight! the bathroom was quit
Happy Review: was clean throughout
Unhappy Review: the bedroom was small and bathroom! a few bits could do with amending

Review Title: Clean modern and well situated. All good apart from the parking confusion.
Happy Review:
The location was good. It was a short walk to the river and some of the central spots. 
Clean and modern room. Friendly staff. Breakfast was a good selection and included in the price.
Unhappy Review:
Confusion about the parking. We knew spaces were limited and first-come-first-serve, however my friend arrived first and was reassured that we could park on the yellow hatch marked boxes up against the building if no spaces were available. 
I arrived and parked in one of those yellow boxes, however when I double checked this at check-in, the staff member I spoke to said this was not allowed due to a recent change of policy. She told me I would have to move the car and gave some poor advice about other local car parks (one of them only allowed 4-hour slots whereas I was staying for 48 hours and the other one required pre-booking and had no availability). I asked why several other cars were parked in the boxes and received a vague answer that they were guests who were checking out, however this was 5.30pm and I also noted that there were at least 2 different cars parked in the yellow boxes at any point during my stay. Ultimately I managed to grab a proper space (quite expensive at £20 per night) but it all made for a frustrating and flustering start to the stay. 
I should mention that my friend was also told that the disabled bays were fine to use if nothing else was available but I would not have felt comfortable to do that.

Happy Review: room was lovely, clean and spacious, breakfast was very good, location was a bit out of town
Unhappy Review: location a bit out of town

Happy Review: Great location, well appointed room which was available early :-)
Unhappy Review: Restaurant was pricey and the shower cubicle ceiling paint was peeling badly.

Review Title: Not bad for a few days in Bristol
Happy Review:
First of all, let me give a shout-out to the extremely helpful hotel personnel who went out of their way to make our stay problem-free. Thank you.
Staying on the positive side, the location of the hotel is great, it is located a few minutes from shopping centres, not too far from nice attractions. And Bristol is a very nice city.
Unhappy Review:
The room was small and heating was not adequate, so an electric heater was provided which had a tendency to overheat when we used it full on.
During early morning I was able to sit in the bar and work, though the wall sockets did not have power.

Happy Review:
The staff were very friendly and courteous and could not do enough for you, from the reception to restaurant to chamber maids, all were amazing. Before we arrived, I asked for an early check-in due to getting to Bristol very early that morning. A note was put on the system. On arrival, no rooms were available, which was very understandable, but we were told to go into the restaurant and grab a coffee or some food while we where waiting , to me, this was a really nice gesture to arriving guests.. 
Then we were told our room was ready, we were in our room around 11.30/12.00 ... the hotel could do no wrong, the whole hotel is kept very clean and all staff are an absolute credit to the hilton group, If we return to Bristol I know exactly where we will be staying ' The Hilton Garden Inn'
Unhappy Review: Nothing..

Review Title: Great location, easy to check in and out
Happy Review: Staff very friendly and efficient

Review Title: nice hotel great staff and breakfast
Happy Review: nice central clean parking on site
Unhappy Review: room was very hot a/c didn’t get very cold.

Happy Review: Suited my needs for a single night stay
Unhappy Review: Some very rude and unhelpful staff on the front desk

Happy Review: We had very friendly service and we really enjoyed the central location which is walking distance to kings street and the nightlife. Booked in advance so the rooms were good value as well.
Unhappy Review: No complaints at all.

Review Title: Perfect for a meet up as just round the corner from the train station
Happy Review: It was the chosen and ideal location for a small group of friends to meet up.
Unhappy Review: There was no warm relaxing area of comfy seating

Happy Review: Hotel is located set back from a main road, 8 minutes walk from Temple Meads station. Access can be made from front or rear. Restaurant on ground floor. Lifts to all floors. Spacious double room, with shower room. Cupboard with ironing board and iron. Large flat screen TV opposite large double bed, featuring bedside shelves, lamps, reading lights and sockets. Side table/desk with drawers inc. hairdryer, lamp and office style chair. Folding wall mirror above. Floor to ceiling window with opening pane, view only of a close neighbouring building under construction (as of March 2023). Additional comfortable leatherette chair. Double mirrored wardrobe with hangers and drawers, side cupboard containing fridge and safe. Clean kettle and basic tea & coffee above. Shower room with toilet, shelves, sink, and separate shower cubicle. Various towels and soap dispensers provided.
Unhappy Review: Really not much to fault. The bed creaked and banged every time I moved. Lifts could be heard clearly despite my room being some distance from them. The main ceiling light didn't work. One of the desk drawers was broken.

Happy Review: It is close to town and the station. It has all the facilities that I need.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: I’m a bit of a foodie and whilst the cooked breakfast looked good it was only OK.. eggs were under, sausage and bacon were over.. I appreciate it’s a buffet and it’s hard to get right.. the bread I toasted was actually really good!!
Unhappy Review:
The bed creaked loudly from any movement.. I looked under and it was made from MDF sections that were loosely bolted together and without correct tools I couldn’t fix it! Wasn’t a deal breaker…
Bathroom was tiny and shower was in poor condition, broken door hinge, cracked tray and blistered paint to ceiling.. 
All clean and functional, would have been upset if I had paid any more!

Happy Review: Location, staff and good value. A light and airy hotel with comfortable clean rooms.

Review Title: Cheap and clean but rather basic
Happy Review: Location and parking. Basic but clean.
Unhappy Review: Air con/heating didn't work, no toiletries, bed uncomfortable. In need of TLC for example mirror and toilet roll holder both loose. Did the job for a cheap hotel.

Happy Review:
good location.
good breakfast
Unhappy Review:
a few spillage marks on the walls.
bathroom very small

Happy Review: Staff were excellent, breakfast was very good, bed was very comfortable. Easy parking.
Unhappy Review: Not a lot. Quite a lot of noise at night.
the bed had a few stains on the bedding
It was a bit cold in the room and the heating fan vas very noisy!

Review Title: Nice hotel, great location. lovely breakfast and friendly helpful staff.
Happy Review: Comfortable room, great location, friendly helpful staff, great breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Room was a little cold to  start with despite heating on maximum, bur warmed up later (I presume centrally controlled). On the expensive side for what it is, but that's Bristol for you.

Review Title: Very pleasant.  Everything we needed.  Will probably come again.
Happy Review: Room was great - we seemed to get a free upgrade
Unhappy Review: If we were being really fussy I suppose we would like barista coffee at breakfast

Happy Review: Great location, excellent breakfast and breakfast staff. Good quality food in the restaurant.
Unhappy Review: Beds/pillows a bit hard. subject to choice!

Happy Review: Staff on desk and in the restaurant were very polite and helpful
Unhappy Review: The bottles in bathroom need to be checked and filled up when room is made up and the room wasn't very warm

Happy Review: Breakfast was nice & our room was good.
Unhappy Review: Other guests banging around and shouting at 4am
I was on the top floor and unfortunately I could hear the av fans on the roof, kept me awake abit

Happy Review:
staff friendliness.
location.
Comfortable and clean room.  Nice and friendly receptionists.
Unhappy Review: We drove by car but it was extremely difficult to find the hotel due to road works in the vicinity.  A message from the hotel before the day of arrival would have been helpful to advise on the route.  When we arrived there was a huge noise coming from the dining room area where people were drinking, and drunk.  Perhaps some carpets would help to soften the noise?

Happy Review: The great location and friendly and helpful staff.

Review Title: Fairly standard hotel of its type, can't complain.
Happy Review: Comfortable beds, good bar, easy distance to walk into town
Unhappy Review: We suspected the car park would be full, as it is advertised as first come, first served, so we parked out of town. Glad we did, the car park was full and there's not really anywhere local to it that we could see to find a spot.

Review Title: Good if you don’t mind a very small bathroom
Happy Review: friendly staff, handy location for what I needed
Unhappy Review: bathrooms are very small. The shower door is a challenge to manage!

Happy Review: comfortable

Review Title: Great stay. Wonderful staff and delicious breakfast.
Happy Review: Very friendly staff. Superb breakfast. Really comfortable beds.
Unhappy Review: Toilets downstairs had a broken door and the hotel room didn’t have a bath.

Happy Review:
Well equipped, sound insulated room.
Friendly, helpful staff.
Decent breakfast.
Unhappy Review: The price! Just over £200 for the lowest standard room, then £20 to park and £13pp for breakfast.

Review Title: it was overpriced, I have stayed at nicer Premier Inns and Travel lodges for less money
Happy Review: good location
Unhappy Review: very uncomfortable bed, both nights we struggled to sleep, the room was too hot and the A/C turned off after 5 minutes

Happy Review:
Location
Offered early check in on arrival without asking
Unhappy Review: Staff at reception weren’t very familiar with bus options & timetable to airport. Information online but had hoped for a little local knowledge to make best decision to be on time

Happy Review: Good Location for City Centre and Railway Station
Room and facilities were exceptionally clean and tidy. Bed was very comfortable. Breakfast service was lovely and satisfying. Arrival and departure was smooth and fast.
Unhappy Review: The air temperature control was out-dated, and very loud in the room.

Review Title: lovely weekend but wouldn’t stay again
Happy Review: the location
Unhappy Review: It was advertised in a very luxurious way, promised city views and got scaffolding and boarded up buildings. Said it was soundproof but alas it was not and we could hear people throwing up the alcohol they consumed at 2am. A queen suite which was smaller than our room at home. It was a lovely weekend but I wouldn’t book again.

Review Title: great location for station and shopping. clean room wonderful staff
Happy Review: good location. wonderful staff.
Unhappy Review: nothing really

Happy Review:
Friendly staff
Comfortable bed
Very clean

Great welcome, friendly, helpful staff. Spotlessly clean room, good facilities, good bed, bedding crisp and clean we had an excellent nights sleep.  Excellent quality  breakfast, nothing too much trouble for staff, airy, light spacious dining area.
Unhappy Review: Nothing!

Review Title: Decent hotel if on a budget. Noisy room but great breakfast!
Happy Review:
- breakfast was very good and great variety! one of the best I had in the UK! 
- not far from city center, location is good. nice garden nearby.
- staff was very friendly !
Unhappy Review:
- the room A/C is too noisy and does not really heat much even at max power. 
- I could not sleep because of the noise from the A/C
- bathroom very small
- pillows were not very comfortable and felt cheap
- room a bit worn out

Happy Review: well situated and clean
Unhappy Review: breakfast - some parts were look warm - beans

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Clientele

Review Title: We had a lovely time staff amazing hotel clean and spacious
Unhappy Review: On my booking I was advised breakfast would cost £10 per person but was charged £12.50

Happy Review: Great shower, very comfortable bed (bit squeaky only) at a very good location. Walking distance to the centre and close to the train station with direct bus to the airport (8£). Everything you ask for in an hotel like this

Review Title: Good for short stay and easy to access the attractions nearby.
Happy Review: the staff is helpful and nice, but one of the three Room has strange smell.
good location and clean. good air con.
Unhappy Review: no omelette for breakfast or fresh fruit. TV remote didn’t work.

Review Title: nice staff, clean and overall great value! definitely would come again!!
Happy Review: lovely staff, very clean, comfy, good location and I loved the Crabtree and Evelyn products in the bathroom!!
Unhappy Review: I get quite chilly and the heating was not working in the room, plus the instructions next to it were for a different style unit

Happy Review: Great location close to mainline station and short walk to city centre. Large, clean room.
Unhappy Review:
The hotel receptionist charged more than the advertised rate for breakfast but this was sorted after a formal email complaint. 
The heating in the room was not fully operational.

Review Title: Professional, easy check-in, superb hotel with great breakfast!
Happy Review: Breakfast was amazing, the waffle maker was a complete surprise and added bonus!
Unhappy Review: Only downside to the room is would of love to have a bath, but the shower was wonderful anyway

Happy Review: Close to city centre but in a quiet location
Unhappy Review: All good!!

Happy Review: All as expected.
Unhappy Review: Room to park when I arrived but actually getting into the car park was not easy - no signs to direct from main road as no access from main road - have to go around the back roads and through some building works to other buildings.

Happy Review: Clean and tidy hotel in a good location
Unhappy Review:
Access with a car was very difficult with no signage.
Dinner choices were quite limited

Happy Review:
Breakfast staff very efficient, friendly and the area was always replenished. 
The toiletries in the room were lovely and it was great to see a new hairdryer. 
Public areas very clean and lift was spacious.
Unhappy Review: No one came in to make our bed or renew our refreshments on either day of the stay. That would have been good.

Happy Review: Clean and comfortable, with amazing staff. Restaurant food was delicious, would definitely recommend.
Unhappy Review: Really tight on the tea/coffee front...  Constantly had to go to reception to ask for more. Reception were happy to give, but it would have been so much nicer to have more than 2 coffee sachets and 4 milk.

Happy Review: V good breakfast
Unhappy Review: Prior information regarding city roadworks

Happy Review:
good area, clean rooms and friendly staff. Breakfast was delicious. 
only downfall was beds very uncomfortable and hard.
Unhappy Review: beds very uncomfortable

Happy Review: great location, reasonable price, comfy beds, parking
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: clean, functional
Unhappy Review:
£20 for parking is terrible and opportunities for making even more money, The room was worth what we paid so parking on top was laughable 
no extra touches and the shower had hand gel instead of shampoo

Happy Review: Breakfast was great
Unhappy Review: The room was very noisy due to generators or something. I turned the air con off but this noise throbbed all might!! My room was 524

Happy Review: Rooms were to a good standard, breakfast and bar area very good
Unhappy Review: Cardio Machines were not working in the gym

Happy Review:
Good location, done us well for new year's.
Nice bar downstairs and drinking water, friendly staff and a clean environment
Unhappy Review: Nothing besides having to pay to park

Review Title: really good service once you arrive. clean and tidy
Happy Review: bright, clean and smelt nice
Unhappy Review: location and parking

Happy Review: The hotel was what you would expect from a Hilton sunchain. Clean, unspectacular. Good location. Room was a good size and showers were great.
Unhappy Review:
I lost my debit card in the week leading up to my stay. Advised by booking.com to update card prior to the stay. The hotel took a payment of about £1 to check the card.
I went to check in where we were greated by a member of staff who was somewhat nonplusssed that we were there. In fairness she had checked another couple in just prior. There were other customers at the desk.
I was asked for my details. The receptionist, within earshot of my parter and other customers, mentioned that my card was declined earlier in the week, in a tone and demeanour which was not friendly. I explained that I had put a new card on file which the hotel had taken money from. The fact this was said in earshot of others was quite emabarrasing.
I checked in. Nipped downstairs shortly after and took a can of soft drink from the fridge in reception. As soon as I took the can out, another member of staff approached me asking if I intended to pay for it. This happened within a split second of me removing said can from the fridge. This leads me to believe that something may have been mentioned re: the declined card, as if I had been profiled. I advised the member of staff that I had intended to pay for this. I put the can in the fridge as I felt embarrased and purchased from the bar instead, from that member of staff, to save any awkwardness in regards to the fridge.
I went to reception the next morning having slept on this. A male receptionist was on at this point. I recounted yesterdays issues with him, only to be informed that they always challenge people using the fridge as people assume it is free (it clearly isnt, the price list is visible). He seemed exasperated to even consider dealing with my complaint. There was no apology or anything.
I felt as though I was being looked down

Happy Review: Friendly and helpful reception staff
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Excellent location near station, friendly staff
Happy Review: central location
Unhappy Review: rooms a little cold

Review Title: great location- lovely friendly helpful staff-
Happy Review: food was fabulous
Unhappy Review: diversion and road closures

Review Title: handy location for bar on the river
Happy Review: good location
Unhappy Review: advertised as parking on site but only after booking does it say first come basis. got the last space when I arrived at 4pm for check in

Review Title: very good location and good staff, shame about the room and size.
Happy Review: The property is in a very good location, with easy access to the city centre and train station. Views over the gardens are good and the location is perfect for a “car free” visit to Bristol. The entrance and fragrance in the reception area is exceptional and the staff were very friendly.
Unhappy Review: The rooms are simply not big enough for the price being demanded, in addition the mattress was very uncomfortable to sleep on and the bed creaked and cracked with every movement on it (a person who weighs less than 80kg) this made for a very disruptive nights sleep. The in room facilities although adequate do not reflect what I would’ve expected from a Hilton brand hotel. The wash/bathroom is tiny with very little room to move in and the shower again was very small.

Review Title: great value and clean rooms highly recommended
Happy Review:
staff or manager was so helpful with advise where to visit on our tour of Bristol 
clean rooms and breakfast was very yummy 
would highly recommend
Unhappy Review: na

Happy Review: The reception staff were lovely and helpful
Unhappy Review: One of the cleaner ladies was really rude and tried to get into my room even though the door had the "do not disturb" sign on. She was aggressively trying to break in, and when I did leave my room- she was then rude to me. One time, she didn't even bother to clean it.

Happy Review: Convenience

The location was prefect for me as I had come here by train. So it only took me a few minutes to get off the train and reach the hotel. Besides, there is a bus station in front of hotel, which means you can easily get to the city center.
Unhappy Review: Almost everything in the hotel was very good. There was only one thing I didn't like and that was the small size of the room and the small bathroom.

Happy Review: Friendly staff,  nice comfortable rooms
Good Location
Unhappy Review: Cost

Happy Review: Nice foyer with friendly and accommodating staff
Unhappy Review: My room was cold but was given a portable heater.

Review Title: OK but expensive parking (even when empty) and mis-priced breakfast
Happy Review: Comfort & location
Unhappy Review: High price parking. High price breakfast, which was increased by £2 over advertised rate, and increased by a further £2 if not pre-booked

Review Title: great staff, ambience and value for money
Happy Review: really lovely staff and check in experience, friendly bar staff and really nice ambience downstairs, room was basic but nice and clean.

Review Title: it served its purpose being close to centre and relatives
Happy Review: convenient location
Unhappy Review: ltd parking

Happy Review: Staff are always helpful and willing to go the extra mile. The location is convenient - close to the town centre but in a quiet spot.

Review Title: Just a better class of 'basic'. PLUS parking expense!
Happy Review: Great location for our stay in Bristol and a very comfortable (and warm thankfully) room.
Unhappy Review: Not much in the way of hotel facilities. The restaurant/bar wasn't somewhere you wanted to spend time. And you pay £16 a night for parking, which isn't made clear in the booking steps. This felt like 'hidden' costs to me. Plus parking, plus breakfast! For a Hilton, it had no luxurious feel to it at all. Just a better class of 'basic'. I wouldn't stay again.

Review Title: good hotel for a night’s stay.
Happy Review: the location was perfect. The staff were lovely and the room was comfortable and very clean. the snack we had in the bar was delicious if a little pricey.
Unhappy Review: my room was freezing even after turning up the heat and the aircon fan sounded like a freight train. even after I switched it off it occasionally started up again. a bottle of water and some tissues in the room would have been appreciated.

Happy Review: location, friendly staff, good breakfast
Unhappy Review: problem with heating, resolved with a heater and extra duvet

Review Title: Good modern hotel near Temple Meads station
Happy Review:
The staff were great, so helpful, and helped us to find somewhere to go out for dinner.
Room was very modern and comfortable, good bathroom.
We had a nice view of the park, and it's super convenient for Temple Meads train station
Unhappy Review:
The price was room only and quite high because of that.
It's quite a modern hotel, but would be improved by adding some USB charging points, which most modern hotels seem to have these days

Happy Review: Staff welcoming, beds comfortable and room not too warm
Unhappy Review: The soap dispenser in the bathroom was empty.  There was no water at all on one of the mornings so could not shower/wash before breakfast.

Happy Review: The hotel is nice room was very cramped and too small for two people. Offered up grade by email but was refused on the reception desk on arrival infront of other customers very embarrassed bathroom was tiny had to ho in and shut the door to be able to get to the toilet.. no biscuits in the room and only a couple of milks.
Unhappy Review: Clean and breakfast was good

Happy Review: Breakfast!
Clean. Comfortable. Close to train station.
Unhappy Review: Far out from main area.. where most restaurants and pubs are.

Review Title: stayed in many hotels in Bristol it was okay
Happy Review: Nice and clean
Unhappy Review: we arrived to be told there was no bar Friday or Saturday evening due to private parties. limited parking too which we weren’t expecting

Review Title: A comfortable stay in an ideal location.
Happy Review: The staff were very helpful, the room was comfortable and the breakfast buffet was very nice.
Unhappy Review: Some of the facilities were a little tired and need of update/replacement. For example, the window catch was broken and the mirror was not properly in its fixture.

Review Title: overnight stay to meet family. good location easy walk into centre
Happy Review: good location
Unhappy Review: paying for parking

Happy Review: The man on Reception was very helpful even got me and extra duvet as I was cold
Unhappy Review: Our neighbours had no respect

Happy Review: Everything. Lovely welcome, given extra blankets as get cold and amazing breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Only one thing. Mattress was not that comfortable and very creaky when turning over.
the beds were very creaky and the walls very thin - could hear everything next door

Review Title: A one stay and the hotel delivered in all respects. Staff are superb, helpful and freindly
Happy Review: Staff were very helpful during and after my stay. I left an item in the room which they found and communicated to me, then returned.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review:
located in walking distance from Temple Meads Rail Station. Rooms are well appointed. Twin bedded rooms are bigger then  Queen bed rooms.  Breakfast is nice and good spread. More Veg dishes would be appreciated in breakfast.
Bus no 8 stop is right in front of the hotel to go to Clifton Suspension Bridge and near Cabot Circus Departmental Store.
Trains to Cardiff and Bath  Spa Town are easily available from Temple Meads Rail Station.  Thanks to the Reception staff for sending Birthday Cake for my wife to our Room.

Review Title: Nice, clean hotel. A bit expensive for what you are getting.
Happy Review: Room was clean
Unhappy Review:
Bed really hard and uncomfortable 
Not a lot of parking available

I had specifically asked for some gin to be delivered on the 2nd night of our stay (as my friend's special anniversary) but sadly they had put it out on the first night so when we arrived it was already sitting there, very nice, but on the wrong day.  I told a member of staff at Reception and he said what would he like me to do and I half-heartedly said 'Another would be nice on the actual day of celebration tomorrow night!' He said fine - which was a mistake as it did not appear the next evening. He should not have agreed without asking his supervisor probably.  A beautiful hotel so this was a real shame that this happened.

Happy Review: Parking available on site. Large clean room. Nice breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Having to pay for parking on site.

Happy Review: Close to station. Staff were very good, friendly and helpful throughout, especially as just arrived from Heathrow Garden Hilton, so better in comparison. Breakfast was OK (although surprisingly, not as good as the Heathrow GH). Didn't have dinner but a satisfactory (if expensive) sandwich and the bar was reasonably pleasant.
Unhappy Review: Rooms are a bit small and I didn't find the bed that comfortable (others may have a different experience). The place is looking a bit tired, but not unacceptably so.

Review Title: Adequate room for overnight stay with comfortable bed.  Avaialbility of bar.  Breakfast on site.
Happy Review:
Comfortable room.
Close to Temple Meads railway station - 5 minute walk
Close to city centre - 10 minute walk
Moderately close to university - 20 minute walk
Unhappy Review:
Shower room small
Breakfast food a little overcooked
Requested quiet room but adjacent to main ring road so traffic noise - muffled.

Review Title: Enjoyable return visit to this clean, comfortable, hotel supported by friendly and helpful staff.
Happy Review: We have stayed there before. Comfortable good-size room. Good restaurant. Pleasant, helpful staff. Mini fridge in room really useful. Wi-Fi was fairly reliable. Bed was comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Would have liked a bath as well as a shower. A couple of maintenance issues in room. Had to ask twice for more toilet rolls. No shampoo in dispenser. Pillows were a bit soft. Cleaner took the wine glasses we brought, but bar staff happily replaced these. Car park expensive at £16 per day.

Happy Review: Staff were great
Unhappy Review: Room was a little small.

Review Title: Nice, welcoming and generally clean hotel. Rooms are a little outdated.
Happy Review: Lobby was clean, glamorous, and smelled lovely, nice and open and very inviting.
Unhappy Review: The room seemed a little outdated with the decor, that had chips, scratches all over it and also loose hair left in the drawers. I felt like the attention to detail when it came to cleaning was somewhat rushed.

Review Title: Ideal place for music venues and temple meades
Happy Review:
Central location- for Temple Meades
Easy to find
Walkable
Quiet (from outside noise)- even on the main road side!
Bathroom good size
Toiletries available
Iron and ironing board available 
Tv actually worked (no TV guide though)
Bed size was good (two twins together)
Unhappy Review:
Needs sockets on both sides of bed
Noise- bathrooms, from neighbouring rooms
Pillows too soft- feather (personal preference)
Size comparable to price, didn’t feel like a good deal

Review Title: the proof that great employees will make your stay better
Happy Review: the lobby area and the breakfast. But the only thing that made it worth it was the personnel. The girls at the reception were amazing. Super friendly and helpful. The made the difference
Unhappy Review: The bathroon was not clean.

Happy Review: close to transport links

Review Title: Very convenient and parking was a bonus. Lovely staff and great location
Happy Review: Really convenient location and parking too for £16 for 24 hours, which was great for us. The housekeeping staff were super helpful as I asked for extra cups and towels and nothing was too much trouble for them.  The breakfast was very good too. A minor and very minor would be to have more fruit options rather than just melon and pineapple, but everything else was excellent.
Clean and comfortable and in a central location - staff were really friendly!

Review Title: Great Location with good accommodation and facilities
Happy Review: Very handy for Temple Meads station.  Good location for getting around the city.
Good location, easy check in, good room extras
Unhappy Review: Both towels had stains on them

Happy Review: Lovely clean rooms. Very friendly and helpful staff.  Brilliant location. Really nice selection at breakfast.
Staff exceptionally aware of disability issues.
Unhappy Review: Room a little small to manoeuvre the wheelchair.
breakfast was a little disappointing not very warm and hair on scrambled eggs

Happy Review: A welcoming and very comfortable hotel - rooms are spotless, comfortable and with great views toward the park (rear).  Easiky accessible from Temple Meads. Staff are friendly and responsive.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Sort out the car parking - just saying it is very limited is not at all helpful!
Happy Review: Very helpful staff, hotel was clean, well maintained and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Ridiculous system with the car parking - not nearly enough car parking spaces - said first come first served but this caused me considerable distress not knowing whether I could access a car parking space and no idea where else I could park because there was no offer of other information or signage.  There was more room in the tiny car park to create more spaces but the owner has not bothered to think about the basic needs of its customers.  Put me off staying there.  I gave it a good as the female receptionist on duty very kindly allowed me to park in an unused disabled car park which I really appreciated her for her initiative for a system that was not her fault.

Happy Review: location and cleanliness
Unhappy Review: good choice for breakfast but hot food was cold

Happy Review: Smart hotel. Handy location for the train.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast was a little disappointing as there was no brown bread for toast and the poached egg didn't taste nice.

Review Title: Great location , cheap when booking early. would stay again
Happy Review:
close to city center , parking available at the hotel at rate of £16 a night.
staff allowed us to check in early and have rooms next to each other
Unhappy Review:
rooms are very simple for a Hilton. lots of
little snagging that could have been done. loose toilet handle , black Sicilians seals etc

Review Title: Perfect for our needs but were starving when we went to bed
Happy Review: Very clean, friendly staff, good location for where we needed to be
Unhappy Review:
Beds too hard, even though the heating / air conditioning was off, it was very noisy and sounded like we were in a wind tunnel throughout the night. 
No where it get food when we came back at 11.30pm, bar and resteraunt closed and no takeaways near hotel

Happy Review:
Staff very helpful when there was a problem checking in. 
Room very clean and comfy.
Unhappy Review: The problem checking in! I booked through booking.com but unfortunately there was no record of my booking. Luckily there was a room available and my booking was honoured.

Happy Review: good location - good food
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Nice quiet location just outside of main shopping area. Good breakfast clean an comfortable rooms. Friendly staff
Unhappy Review: Hard to find car park on first try!

Happy Review: good location, not a lot of info for tourists New to the city, seems like lots of business travellers, clean, tidy, quiet and comfortable
Room and bed was very comfortable, the choice and standard fo food at breakfast was excellent.
Perfect place to stay for a short visit to Bristol. Very close to train station. Great breakfast selection. Staff very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Mattress a bit firm for me but that’s a personal thing. Rooms fairly soundproof but could hear muffled voices from room next door.

Happy Review: Good location, rooms comfortable, clean and modern.
Unhappy Review: Bar service non existent, limited range of drinks and waited 20 minutes to get served.

Happy Review: Staff on reception were exceptional, made sure we had everything we needed, offered options for food & drinks, gave us a map. Super friendly.
Unhappy Review:
There was a disturbance in the bar. Bar staff did not know how to deal with the irate lady. 
I had to alert reception staff who defused the situation.

Happy Review: Location near station.
Very clean and fabulous central position
Unhappy Review: I found it quite expensive

Review Title: Good location, decent breakfast and smallest toilet for 4* ever
Happy Review: Location is great, and breakfast is a good value for money here
Unhappy Review:
The toilet is very small and has not been renovated quite some time -  not up to 4* rating in my view
Pillows were too soft for my taste

Review Title: It was a sad but joyful reunion having lost quite afew during covid, after fiftysix years.
Happy Review: The staff was very helpful and polite
Unhappy Review: You got my name wrong in the first place.. my surname is CORLETTE and my first name is Gordon couldnot count me in as place me in as a member of HMS ESkimo's reunion party.

Happy Review: Stayed here a couple of times, no real issues. Great location, on site parking, helping staff and room service with tasty food.
Unhappy Review: Whenever I tried to ring reception or room service no one would answer so I ended up having to go down to order, then my order arrived with missing bits. Also I had to sit in the bar for 45 mins as there was a delay with my check in, they told me I was given a free upgrade to apologise but when I got to my room it was tiny and smaller than the one I had originally booked.

Happy Review: Close to amenities
Unhappy Review: The beds!!! Awful, really hard and terribly squeaky

Review Title: o/n stay for a nearby show . beds so comfortable.
Happy Review: lovely hotel , provided everything you needed , friendly staff .
Unhappy Review: The car park is unsuitable. Not enough spaces & very narrow .

Review Title: Great location and comfort in central Bristol.
Happy Review: Location great for walking to everything within the city centre including shopping centres, bars, and restaurants.  Hotel easy to get to from railway station. All staff excellent - welcoming and keen to help. Every part of hotel very clean. Comfortable furnishings. There are plenty of hotels in central Bristol but I would be happy to stay in this one again.
Unhappy Review: Room good if a little dark. Breakfast OK but somehow lacking a little on flavour - eggs cold. Coffee OK.

Happy Review: Room, staff, service all very good.
Unhappy Review: Access to the hotel car park was very difficult due to ongoing work. Very poor sign posting. It took me 40 minutes and several attempts to get into the car park.

Happy Review: clean staff helpful

Review Title: a nice stay in a cosy and clean hotel with very friendly staff
Happy Review: friendly staff, reception open 24 hours, good restaurant
Friendly staff, comfortable room
Unhappy Review: Only slight issue was the limited parking spaces.

Happy Review: The room was good and the reception staff were friendly.The breakfast was excellent.
Unhappy Review: We bought 2 drinks at the bar that came to £23.50.Went back to the bar and had the same 2 drinks,served by the same staff member and it cost more the 2nd time.

Review Title: Great location close to the train station
Happy Review:
Great location close to Temple Meads station although a decent walk to Cabot Circus.
Staff on reception were really friendly.
Unhappy Review: I’ve always hated the car park

Happy Review: the staff, especially the manager, Mike. went out of his way for us and was so friendly. The front desk gentleman was adorable also. location was very good to get to the main heart of the city, although taxis seemed confused on how to get there.
Unhappy Review: breakfast was buffet only.

Happy Review: location and cleanliness
Unhappy Review: small twin room

Review Title: Lovely hotel, friendly staff, would recommend
Happy Review: Great breakfast, lots of choice.  Handy location
Staff were very helpful.   Couldn't do enough
Unhappy Review: The sink in our room had a huge crack right through it.
Needed to contact hotel a few hours before arrival. No-one answered the phone on the numerous times I called. Finally sent an email which did get a reply.

Happy Review: Friendly staff, lovely breakfast. Clean bathroom and bed/bedding. We had 3 rooms booked and reception staff made sure we were in rooms next to each-other without us requesting this. Close to the city centre.
Unhappy Review: Skirting boards and behind beds very dusty, could do with pulling beds out to clean behind.

Review Title: Lovely & comfortable would definitely stay again
Happy Review: I stayed for one night the rooms where lovely & clean bigger enough for two people it had tea/coffee facilities plus hairdryer all the stuff was lovely evening food was a bit pricey but as for breakfast £14 for whatever you could eat and drink which I think is really good
Unhappy Review: How noisy the doors are when they’re closing they close with quite a Big Bang

Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing, all good

Happy Review: The staff and cleanliness and location
Unhappy Review: That there was no parking

Review Title: it was a good place to stay overall
Happy Review: comfort and location were both good
Unhappy Review: cost-cant believe the cost was without breakfast!

Happy Review:
The smell in the lobby
clean well furnished rooms
free lemon water in lobby
Unhappy Review:
noisy
terribly squeaky bed… goodness knows what the other rooms thought! 😊
hassle trying to get the tv on

Happy Review: Location, parking and outside seating area. Helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Room wasn’t cleaned properly, under sheet had bloodstains on it and empty shower bottles left in the shower.

Review Title: Nice and comfortable, with some outstanding service
Happy Review: We were looking for the hotel by car at about 6 pm on Saturday night. We could not find it. We rang the hotel, and the receptionist on duty was brilliant at guiding us in by phone and then helping us in the car park.
Unhappy Review: Arrangements for breakfast could have been managed a bit better. For example, I asked for honey. The member of staff returned with two large boxes of the stuff, suggesting it was meant to be on offer but was not. No-one checked me in on either breakfast that I attended. I could have walked in off the street.

Happy Review: nice hotel in good location
Unhappy Review: breakfast was not very good and cold and very expensive

Happy Review: The breakfast is outstanding and the bed is very comfortable.

Review Title: Friendly, helpful staff. Clean comfortable and well situated hotel with good amenities.
Happy Review: Second floor, quiet. Comfortable bed and nice shower.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really. Room info was non existent and our room wasn’t made up after our first night but this didn’t affet our enjoyment. The Coffee mugs in the room are too small.

Review Title: Very good if you’re a solo traveler and are only staying in Bristol for a few nights or if you only need a hotel for sle
Happy Review: It’s a 5 min walk from Temple Meads station and my room had a nice view of the park. My bed was very comfy also.

The bolt just wouldn’t loosen for the door to open. Luckily it did in the end, but I think the bolt needs fixing.

I would suggest putting a bottle of water in the rooms as well apart from coffee, tea and sugar bags.

I didn't book breakfast for not sure what hours I'd be working but the rate that Booking.com told me I'd pay on the day was different from what they were going to charge me. Between the hotel and booking.com they got it sorted. Always print things off. The staff in the breakfast area never made contact. Not even a good morning. They were very quick at clearing the tables  even if you had food on your plate and gone to get another coffee. When I returned my table and food had been cleared. They were just not interested in the job.

Review Title: all the staff were very courteous and obliging.
Happy Review: very clean and lovely staff.

Happy Review: Bar, reception and breakfast staff were outstanding

Review Title: Very relaxing stay within easy walk of town centre.
Happy Review: We were on the 5th floor. Even though the room was an the "road" side (i.e. not garden view), it was very quiet. This was the weekend of the boat festival - it was actually quite nice NOT to be in the centre of the action - but close enough to walk without problems. The aircon worked well and kept the room cool even when very hot outside. Very comfy pillows. Didn't try the restaurant. Staff helpful - in the absence of a concierge service, the desk staff were able to advise on a good bakery, and an easy way to get to Cathedral Walk.
Unhappy Review: I still think the price was a tad high; we chose it because everywhere else anywhere near the centre was equally expensive - could have gone out of town, but then would have incurred taxi fares.

Review Title: Great location with good views and easy walking access to train and bus stations
Happy Review: Outstanding location - easy walk from Bristol Temple Meads (easier from the rear exit of the station). Garden facing rooms overlook the Temple avenue of trees, which are very tall and beautiful. Hart's bakery, at the train station, is an easy walk for excellent coffee and pastries. We had breakfast in the churchyard opposite the hotel, on a bench beneat the trees. It was wonderful.
Unhappy Review: Big windows but only one of them opened (and barely at that), and air conditioning that is not as powerful as it needs to be when windows don't open. No hotel stationery (paper or pens). Good selection of teas and coffees, including decaffineated options.

Review Title: functional…. staff were very good, helpful, friendly and efficient
Happy Review: central
Unhappy Review: room could have been cleaner, water marks on doors and walls from old water leaks?

Review Title: Great place to stay, close to the hippodrome.
Happy Review: Very clean and had excellent facilities in the room. Staff were very helpful.
Unhappy Review: The mattress was very hard and parking was ok but limited spaces and expensive.

Happy Review: staff were friendly at reception and the air con in the room was spot on during this heatwave
Unhappy Review: curtains and walls were dirty and marked but nothing too major , double bed was 2 singles pushed together

Review Title: Pleasant stay, comfortable room, hotel staff were really nice
Happy Review: I’d asked for a quiet room and was allocated one that was super quiet. The staff were very pleasant and attentive. The room air temperature was just right. The breakfast was good. The beds were comfortable.
Unhappy Review: The only slight drawback about its otherwise good location is that there aren’t any cafes or restaurants really nearby.

Review Title: Great - would happily stay there again.
Happy Review: Friendly and professional staff.  Efficient service.  Quick checkout.  Room small but well appointed with plenty of storage and a in ironing board and a clean iron (ie not covered in burnt-on residue); an iron and board is so often missing in modern hotels.  Great location close to amenities and train station.
Unhappy Review: Cost a little more than I would have wished, but was competitive in the area.  My stay was so short that I can't really think of anything that I didn't like other than the bar being shut when I arrived - although a self-service option was available in the foyer.

Happy Review:
good location

Unhappy Review: accessibility to parking

Happy Review:
Clean and standard rooms. Good customer service in a fantastic location close to Temple meads Station and Bristol city centre. 
A good all rounder

Review Title: Despite the negatives, I enjoyed my short stay and would recommend.
Happy Review: Location was good, within walking distance to the train station and local attractions. Room was perfect size. Staff were welcoming and friendly at all times. I went out into the local area for the morning and came back to a freshly made bed and everything had been restocked in the room.
Unhappy Review: I felt like I was on Four in a Bed doing the room inspections, haha! The room I stayed in had dust lying around (on bed headboard, bedroom sides, areas in the shower room). The shower room was a bit small but that could just be my personal preference. The shower head was dripping despite being turned off. One of the clean hand towels had dirt on. The main light didn't work and neither did one of the plug sockets.

Happy Review: nice hotel with a modern feel
Unhappy Review: very confusing to get to- the postcode takes you to the front of the building on a duel carriage way and a confusing one way system that you can’t turn down hence you can’t access the Hotel with the postcode

location

Review Title: Now that I know how to access the car park, this is a great place to stay.
Happy Review: Very comfortable hotel situated in exactly the right place for our requirements.
Unhappy Review:
Finding and getting into the car park was a nightmare.
Our satnav took us almost to the hotel but then I had to ask directions. I followed those and as I drove I could see the front of the hotel but with no apparent access for a car. I eventually parked and went into a Novotel hotel to ask for directions. Although the staff were helpful they were unable to give me exact directions. So, I walked around the block to the Hilton Garden Inn where the receptionist explained that I had to drive through an archway, which was clearly marked 'Novotel Hotel', and follow the road to the rear of the Garden Inn Hotel. Quite ridiculous!
I could find no mention of this when I re-read everything on my confirmation email. Surely something as fundamental as this should be stated prominently on both booking.com and the hotel website?
Also, the hotel charges £16 per day for parking. I don't remember reading that on the website.
For any potential guests who might read this review, you should be aware that there are a few spaces in the lane behind the hotel (200 yards from the rear entrance to the hotel) where parking costs are about £5 a day. Not exactly secure but if, like me you object to rip-off parking then this might be an option.

Happy Review: Location close to the Temple Mead railway station. Breakfast choice was very good and the staff were very professional
Unhappy Review: A view of concrete block of an old multi-storey car park from my hotel room window.

Review Title: The staff is very gracious and helpful and the breakfast was a good deal and plentiful.
Happy Review: The hotel is very conveniently located to the train station, the harbor area and the Cabot Circus shopping area; all within walking distance and a bus stop for the number 8 bus is right outside and goes around the main harbor area and up to Clifton Park and the zoo. This hotel is more convenient to the train station than most but it’s a nice walk along the canal to the harbor and the M Shed area.
Unhappy Review: The room was a bit of a disappointment because it needs a refurb as of May 2022 and the bed was torture but the bathroom looks like it has been redone recently enough to be clean and well equipped and the nicest part is all the shelf space in the bathroom which is rare these days.

Review Title: Wonderfull hotel, we hope to come back soon!
Happy Review:
A small and clean room with a queen szized bed with a quite comfortable mattress. It was very quiet due to the fact that we had a room next to the street. The bathroom had some good amanities and was also very clean. 
The breakfast was a typical english breakfast, the staff was very nice. We didn´t booked a breakfast option in advance but that was not a problem. 
The hotel is located near the center of the town, just a 10 minute walk away. The next station Temple meads is also nearby.
In conclusion a nice located hotel, we enjoyed our stax. We hope to come back soon!
Unhappy Review: Overall we had a wonderfull experience at the Hilton Garden Inn so it is quite difficult to find something that was wrong or could be done better. The only thing we recognized was the lacking of fresh salad, but thats what not to expect for a typical english breakfast ;-)

Review Title: Overall - the room was exactly what I needed and the staff were very friendly. No issues at all.
Happy Review:
Woman who checked me in was very nice, very accommodating, and found me an available room to check into at 11am, despite check in technically being at 3pm. That was great.
She also helped with getting the 2nd room key to my friend who was arriving later. She gave me all the necessary details around breakfast etc,
Unhappy Review:
Difficult to say the price was great. I originally booked for just myself which was £140 for just me for one night. I then swapped to 2 single beds so my friend could join & the price stayed the same, and I saved money by splitting the cost. 
Ideally single people shouldn't be penalised for not having a partner, and booking for just 1 person should be cheaper than booking for 2.

Review Title: Will definitely go again, but only if a proper disabled room with twin beds is available
Happy Review: Very clear (and necessary) directions given to the hotel and the adjoining car park.  Superb location for easy walking access to the city centre and docks.  Excellent wheelchair access for my wife's wheelchair.  The staff at reception and in the restaurant were so helpful,  above and beyond expectations.  Good atmosphere with the staff.  Given thorough instructions for disabled exit in the event of an emergency. Lobby, waiting area, restaurant all on one ground floor level.  Beds were very good, we both slept really well, much better than at home.  Plenty of eating places to suit all tastes within 10 mins walk of the hotel.
Unhappy Review: We needed twin beds due to my wife's disability.  The only disabled rooms with twin beds were not full spec for disabled, so the room was too narrow, and no seat in the shower and insufficient handholds.  The full spec disabled rooms only had double beds.  I  spoke to the manager, who was so helpful, efficient and friendly in all matters, who said he would recommend to your GM to adapt one of these rooms for twin beds.  No biscuits in the room!  Food in the restaurant was good but not excellent.  The scrambled eggs were outstanding one morning and quite awful on the next day.  Coffee machine troublesome..

Unhappy Review: The shower was nice but rather small. The curtains were not black out and I'm a rather light sleeper. The duvet was too heavy for the time of year.
