Good breakfast
clean
Unhappy Review:
TV’s need updating to smart TV’s
Pillows need changing

Review Title: Very comfortable place to be in a CBD area
Happy Review: The breakfast was excellent, staff hospitality very good, location is excellent, closed to town centre, no need for a taxi.
Unhappy Review: No toothe paste in room

Happy Review: Car parking outside hotel was brilliant, reception staff friendly, enough lifts and stairs to floor easy to find and use.  Food delicious and quality excellent.

Great location for my gig and city centre.
Room was ideal for my one night stay with iron for my clothes.
Unhappy Review: I did get message from hotel saying masks to be worn in all areas of hotel but when arriving no masks were being worn by staff or guests.

Review Title: Perfect stay would return again and again
Happy Review: Second stay within this hotel this year. I’d return again and again when coming to Bristol. Good location short Uber to everything you need. Rooms are all very modern and both stays we’ve had no complaints with either room both different to eachother. All very clean. Nice area downstairs where you can eat ; drink or just grab a small snack. All staff friendly throughout the stay. Gym downstairs which I didn’t go in but had a peek and it seems alright. Highly recommend
Unhappy Review: Room had a view of a scary looking abandoned car park which was a little unsettling but just kept the curtain closed , didn’t expect much of a view in Bristol city centre anyway

Happy Review: Great location. Very handy for the railway station. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: The bed needed upgraded.

Review Title: Room was nice and staff were friendly. Did seem a bit overpriced. But stay was nice.
Happy Review: Staff were nice. Breakfast was good. Room was nice.
Unhappy Review: Seemed expensive.

Happy Review: The staff were so nice and helpful, and the room is so clean and as it looks on the photos! Location is so close to Bristol Temple Meads station, just around 5 minutes walk, which is so convenient!
Breakfast was lovely, staff were kind and helpful. During the fire evacuation, staff were calm and guided everyone very well.
Unhappy Review: Only downside was the noise level of the bed, as you sat on it, it creaked and was loud throughout the night simply when tossing and turning.

Review Title: Close to Temple Meads station, but a bit far from the centre. Noisy restaurant.
Happy Review: Comfortable bed - firm mattress, firm pillows. Effective air conditioning. Nice view over garden.
Unhappy Review: Better lighting - not easy to read unless in bed. TV was badly set up - I corrected it.

Review Title: Fine for a one night stay
Happy Review: Staff were warm & welcoming. Room was fine for a 1 night stay.
Unhappy Review: Bed was very creaky and hard.

Happy Review: perfect location, close to everything. amazing service, all staff absolutely fab - friendly, professional, welcoming.., best service ever! even got a glass of bubbly on arrival. Shout out to Sasha who was great.
Unhappy Review: basic bathroom and no biscuits

Happy Review: Well located, good breakfast choices, nice staff.
Unhappy Review: Tv options was limited not even the full range of free view. Everything else was fine.

Review Title: Loved the view to Temple Park.  A wonderful sourprise.
Happy Review: The hotel is near the train station but a bit out of the center.  However everything was within a walking distance. The best the park behind the hotel, Temple Park.
Unhappy Review: There were no usb chargers in the room.  Everything needed an adapter.

Review Title: Great location for the train station
Happy Review: Good location for the train station
great location for all the sights of Bristol. we were able to walk everywhere
Unhappy Review: very basic. The bed was so creaky we were waking up every time we turned over. Toilet difficult to flush at times and shower weak.

Happy Review:
Helpful staff and good rates for parking 
Convenient for exploring Bristol
Unhappy Review:
One room smelt of weed. 
We were given a replacement without trouble so that’s fine

Review Title: Freindly staff helped me enjoy a night away in comfortable surroundings.
Happy Review: Great room, good bar/dining area.
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: friendly helpful staff, with great location and very clean and quiet
Happy Review: Staff and location
Location is very convenient to Temple Meads Station . Excellent breakfast,  comfortable room
Unhappy Review: All was good

Happy Review: very clean. Pretty park opposite. Staff were very helpful and efficient
Staff members in the dining areas and bar were fabulous
Unhappy Review: Breakfeast.

Happy Review:
Friendly and helpful staff. 
Very clean.
Unhappy Review: Feather duvet...but was changed (who uses down these days??)

Review Title: We would stay again but wouldn't have the breakfast.
Happy Review: Friendliness of staff, good location, good shower.
Unhappy Review: Cooked breakfast was cold and wasn't worth the money. The drinks both beverage and alcoholic were very expensive.

Review Title: Clean Comfortable with good customer service
Happy Review: Excellent Customer Service - Staff extremely helpful and courteous
A clean, neat hotel in a great location for transport and driving. The room was clean, well kept. Staff were polite and welcoming.
Unhappy Review: Had to call room service a number of times before I got a response.  Other than that, no complaints.

Happy Review:
Great location. Short walk, a bus stop right outside the hotel or a taxi to the central.
Lovely and friendly staff members who was working very hard at the hotel.
I say a big thank you to all the lovely staff members :)
Unhappy Review:
The room was clean and tidy.
Thank you so much for the staff members to work hard for this.
Sadly the room was cold at night, but we didn’t want to turn the heating on because of it made too much noise. We didn’t have a good sleep.
So to make up, we looked forward for the breakfast in the morning(stayed in Hilton in Japan and I thought it was going to be great)but unfortunately, the breakfast quality was poor and we didn’t enjoy.

Happy Review: The WiFi was good, the hotel was clean and ideally placed for the centre of Bristol
Unhappy Review: The room heating was difficult to use and unable ensure a reasonable temperature

Happy Review: Location and friendly service 😊
Unhappy Review: Bar closing at 10.30

Review Title: good location, professional, but loud air con!
Happy Review: Check in was really professional and friendly, the room was nice and clean, the bathroom was designed well, breakfast was convenient and enjoyable. despite being right next to the busy road it was quiet in that respect
Unhappy Review: the air con turning itself on during the night and having to keep turning it off because it was so noisy

Happy Review: Clean, great to have parking, staff friendly. Good selection at breakfast and all fresh. Beautiful view of the gardens and church.
Unhappy Review: Ran out of briwn sauce a breakfast must for many. Limited selection of spirits at the bar and no bar menu.

Happy Review:
Excellent breakfast. So much choice.
Staff lovely. I asked for a quiet room which they arranged before arrival.
Unhappy Review: Tiny bathroom but I was only there for 1 night so I coped ok.

Happy Review: very clean
Unhappy Review: bed was a queen but it was Two twins pushed together fell through the middle

Happy Review: Breakfast was fab, dinner staff lovely. Beds good, room clean not scuffed. Shower good. Gym room appreciated.
Unhappy Review: Difficult to find on foot

Review Title: A good place to get away the tried that I traveled
Happy Review: Good location and welcomed staffs, this is what this hotel have.
Unhappy Review: Really not

Happy Review: spacious room. tasty breakfast.
Clean and comfortable. Great food and very friendly helpful staff who couldn't do enough for you.
Great location close to the station and town centre/attractions a short walk away. Room and all main areas very clean. Nice pleasant hotel. Efficient staff easy quick check in. Nice view from room.
Unhappy Review: The bed was quite squeaky every time you moved. And although we didn't want to watch it much they was little or no reception on the TV.

Happy Review:
clean,efficient and car parking .
exceptional staff
Unhappy Review:
the restaurant food- disgusting dinner - and very limited choice and difficult for allergies. 
staff were very apologetic . 
I have never rated food disgusting  before.

Happy Review:
Quiet room close enough to walk to town.
Good shower.
Helpful staff.
Parking.
Unhappy Review:
Bigger bathroom.
TV that worked (Bad reception)
Would like free parking.
matras and pillows were too soft which is not done for lower-back damage

Review Title: good, clean tidy really polite staff
Unhappy Review: the tv in the room didn’t work properly.

Review Title: Lovely clean hotel very helpful staff
Happy Review: Location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Breakfast and excellent staff from all departments
Unhappy Review:
We asked for a quiet room, doors were slammed at night and in early morning with people shouting .
Other than this loved the food and the location of this hotel also I would return in the future

Review Title: Enjoyed our recent stay here. Would certainly stay here again.
Happy Review: Very clean.  Happy, polite staff.  Good breakfast selection.  Loved the outside seating area.
Unhappy Review: The bathroom is a little tight, with some of the fittings needing attention.

Review Title: Great location, staff and very clean.
Happy Review: Very clean and very helpful staff. Hand sanitizer in lobby. Very good coffee machine for breakfast time.
Unhappy Review: Hard to have a tasty healthy breakfast.

Review Title: As always - hotel was great - location is superb for my purposes but prices are a little high.
Happy Review: Room clean and comfortable.  Hotel has all the facilities you could need.  Staff are always lovely and friendly, plus they are happy to chat.
Unhappy Review: Rooms are starting to need an update - for example no USB ports in sockets for charging devices.  Lighting in this particular room (333) seemed to have a mind of it's own - would sometimes work and other times would randomly come on 5-10 mins after the switch was activated.

Happy Review: very confortable and cozy. great location
Unhappy Review: bathroom quite small specially the shower

Happy Review: i would  stay again and  tell others it was very good
v friendly staff in particular Annie who was v nice
Unhappy Review: I would rate higher if the tv in my room had better signal…it kept cutting out

Review Title: The hotel was convenient to the places we wanted to visit.
Happy Review: We liked the location and were able to park on site.
Unhappy Review: The room and bathroom was small. The fridge was switched off and was empty. The TV connection was poor so it was unwatchable and I couldn’t cast to the TV from my mobile as an alternative.

Review Title: One of the best chain hotels I have stayed in for room facilities, and cleanliness.
Happy Review:
There was a warm and genuine welcome from Bailey at reception, and we given all the info we needed on breakfast / dining and checkout etc. Reception was filled with the most wonderful fragrance too.
The room was immaculately clean, very well laid out with plenty of storage. Having a fridge was a real benefit for milk and cold drinks. 
Although compact the bathroom had a good sized shower. I was delighted to see that there was magnifying mirror installed, and the heated mirror was a great feature.
Breakfast was good and plentiful, but the evening meal was ok but nothing special.
Staff throughout were lovely.
Unhappy Review: The only thing that would prevent me from staying again is the fact that the bed was very uncomfortable for me. Too hard and very creaky. It is shame really as everything else was perfect.

Review Title: Really good. Very welcoming staff throughout the stay.
Happy Review: Friendly staff, comfortable room, good location
Unhappy Review: For a twin room, it would be nice to have two sets of toiletries.

Review Title: Location of the hotel is great and my room was very clean. Wouldn’t have dinner there again.
Happy Review: The room was very clean
Unhappy Review: The quality of the food at dinner was below expectation for the price

Happy Review: Convenient location
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Friendly staff. Good location . Fridge in the room was a bonus. Nice linen and pillows
Unhappy Review: Bed was extra firm

Happy Review: Great location, lovely helpful and kind staff. The room was very quiet considering it overlooked the main road. Lovely hot shower and plenty of space in the room to move about.
Unhappy Review: Loved everything bar the bed. It was abit clunky sounding when you were getting on and off the bed and would of liked it to have been abit softer.

Happy Review: Modern, spotlessly clean. Professional, courteous staff, comfortable bed. Great value for money.  Breakfast an absolute bargain at £9.95
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Excellent breakfast.  Friendly staff.  Good location for railway station.
Clean and comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Being awoken to be told check out was at 12 when i already knew what time check out was.

Happy Review: 15 minutes walk to  city centre
Unhappy Review:
poor car parking for the amount of rooms there 
the reason we won’t book again

Happy Review: close to city, tidy, great breakfast!

Review Title: great location great breakfast and staff very friendly
Happy Review: good breakfast
Unhappy Review: bed was a little hard

Happy Review: Staff, location and food were all absolutely perfect, really friendly, will visit here again!
Unhappy Review: Bed was very creaky.

Happy Review: Friendly staff. Fairly central hotel with parking
Unhappy Review:
Damages/stains on the walls.
If i'm been honest not worth the price. Wouldn't return if not at a discounted price.

Review Title: Good location, quiet but easy to get to main parts of the city, room comfortable and had all I neede
Happy Review:
Room was very clean and comfortable 
Had all I needed - good area to do some work from
Quiet
Good breakfast 
Staff at bistro were really friendly 
Good location 
Availability of coffee good
Unhappy Review: Brittany on reception could have been a bit more friendly and helpful when I arrived. I didn't know info could be found on TV and then did not work on TV.

Happy Review: High standard throughout. Comfortable bed. Good breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Nothing I did not like.

Review Title: Our second stay here, and we'll certainly come again.
Happy Review: All the staff were really pleasant and helpful. Both breakfast and dinner were good and the dining-room spacious and comfortable. The quick checkout system made our departure easy. The location is great too.
Unhappy Review:
The twin room would be more comfortable with an extra chair.; one for each guest.
The approach to the hotel was difficult because of building works along Temple Way and it's hard to find the entry to the car-park

Happy Review: Staff very helpful and welcoming
Unhappy Review: Room was quite small , particularly the bathroom

Happy Review: The location was ideal. The room was clean and large. The bathroom was tidy and clean. The heated mirror in the bathroom was handy.
Unhappy Review: The availability of parking. The car park was full, hard to find and difficult to navigate. Spaces were small and tricky to get into and out of in a standard sized car.

Happy Review: Great location. Good breakfast.
The staff were friendly and welcoming
Unhappy Review: The food was crap,and very limited choice,and over priced

Happy Review: Great location
Unhappy Review: Breakfast should be included

Review Title: Lovely place for a short stay
Happy Review: it was really close to the train station and bus routes to get into town, or if you wanted to walk that was doable as well. It was on a main road but you couldn’t tell because it wasn’t noisy at all
Unhappy Review: Nothing I can think of - everything was good

Happy Review: Great staff, great breakfast and perfect location for train arrivals and departures
The staff at the reception were very welcoming and nice.
Unhappy Review:
It wasn't a best stay, room didn't had much light.
Food facilities were poor specially late at night. 
I would of expected a better experience specially as its hilton.

Review Title: Great hotel near the centre - lots of things in walking distance. Staff friendly and helpful.
Happy Review: The rooms were very clean and comfortable.  We ordered room service one night and the staff were really friendly.  We enjoyed breakfast very much and found the staff really friendly and helpful, especially one guy who was lovely. Unfortunately I didn't see his name but he helped me find the fruit juice! All in all, we had a lovely stay and would recommend the hotel to friends/family when visiting Bristol.
location
Unhappy Review: small bathroom

Review Title: Could have done with staying longer !!
Happy Review:
The bar staff friendly and attentive.
particularly liked the fact that you take 25% blue light card - recognising the nhs x
Unhappy Review: nil

Happy Review: The staff were so friendly, went above and beyond with customer service. It was a lovely room with everything you need for a couple of nights away. The breakfast was tasty and there was a great variety of options
Unhappy Review: It was really good so can only think of the tiniest of niggles - the TV guide didn't work and there was no bottle opener in the room

Happy Review: central
Unhappy Review: clean

Happy Review: good location, secured bike storage, friendly staff, cleanliness
Unhappy Review: n/a

Review Title: Absolutely amazing and would defo come back
Happy Review:
Breakfast was really good and lots of offer. Good hot chocolate!
The rooms were clean and quite spacious with comfy beds. House cleaning was good too
Staff at breakfast were very friendly.
Unhappy Review:
Eggs at breakfast were slightly over cooked and unseasoned.
I love pancakes.. another one of Hilton hotels had pancakes machine

Happy Review: The very friendly gentleman on reception allowed me to check in very early as my room was available. Getting into my room early after a 0630 flight was most welcome & greatly appreciated.
Unhappy Review: It’s location close to the train station.

Happy Review: Really friendly staff and good location.
Friendly helpful staff. Great location
Unhappy Review: Booked through Booking.con and I wasn’t able to amend and remove breakfast from the booking. Also, ordered room service and the food was poor quality and certainly not value for money

Happy Review: Staff were so friendly.
Unhappy Review: Shower could've been cleaner and the cooked breakfast wasn't the tastiest.

Happy Review:
Front desk were fab.
Cake a nice touch.
Clean.
Unhappy Review: Long wait for eggs at breakfast.

Happy Review: Lovely room, excellent facilities. Very nice restaurant & bar area. Comfy bed & pillows.
Unhappy Review: Unfortunately the breakfast & breakfast experience was a total let down. Hot buffet choice was good with quality ingredients but food was totally cold even freshly cooked sausages & beans chef bought out were still cold! Tomatoes & mushrooms were cold, dried up & hard. Very disappointed & never had to complain before about a hotel breakfast but just could not eat it. A refund was handled very well with member of staff on reception. I'm certain this experience was an exception to normal sevice & would not put us off staying again.

Review Title: The hotel served the purpose we required and was a decent quality stay in an excellent location
Happy Review: It was a simple room for a low price. Nothing more, nothing less. Easy access etc too.
clean and good location
Unhappy Review: n/a

Happy Review: room and bathroom very clean. communal areas clean.
Unhappy Review: lack of breakfast items. breakfast served till 11 on a Sunday but got there at 1030 and very little left.

Review Title: Very comfortable just a bit pricey
Happy Review: The food was amazing and staff were welcoming and helpful. Affordable parking near by. Location good.
Unhappy Review: We were happy

Happy Review: Staff Very friendly. Place is clean and good central location
the staff is great and super helpful!!
Unhappy Review: the rooms are reeeally cold and the air con goes on all night which makes it very hard to sleep.

Happy Review: The desk staff were welcoming, wonderful, and very helpful!  The restaurant was great with excellent wait staff and a fun and friendly assistant manager, Leonardo!  The food was delicious too! As tuckered out travelers, we ate there a lot.
Unhappy Review: The bed was not comfortable for it was a mattress on a wooden platform, that creaked whenever we turned or got up.

Happy Review: very clean and good location for city centre
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Location, staff, room
Unhappy Review: Very noisy on News Years Eve

Happy Review: Location for station and city centre. Clean room
Unhappy Review: Tray charge for room service

Review Title: A well presented, clean, friendly, good breakfast, helpful staff, easy access to the City of Bristol
Happy Review:
I stayed here for work. 
I gauge a hotel on "would I stay here for a weekend getaway with the misses?" Answer "Yes!" but I wouldn't take her here if it was our honeymoon...  
The Hotel is well presented. Plenty of car parking spaces. Easy access to the city of Bristol. 
The room was clean and spacious and well laid out. 
The Breakfast was plentiful in choices. 
All in all, I would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone.
Unhappy Review: There's nothing negative to say. The hotel is good.

Happy Review: The staff were very friendly and nice, and the restaurant was great for times when we wanted to stay in. I also really liked that they had a coin laundry for guests to use.
Unhappy Review: The twin beds were fairly comfortable but very noisy and stiff when changing sleep positions.

Happy Review: in a good location
Unhappy Review: £16 for parking

Happy Review: very good hotel .very close to centre
Unhappy Review: music at bar was droning .very expensive parking which you have to take in consideration when staying .

Happy Review: it was perfect
Unhappy Review: nothing

Review Title: had a good nights sleep but needed a better clean
Happy Review: the room was a decent size and the bed was very comfortable had the things we needed
Unhappy Review: the bed was loud to even sit on. the curtain was very stained and it didn’t look like the floor had been hoovered at all and had random stains on it.

Happy Review: Staff were great. Facilities very nice.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast very ordinary and good very overpriced in my view, paid £16.95 for little more than mini fish and chips. Finding the car park difficult would have been better to know the road where the car park is rather than the main road where there is no entrance.

Review Title: enjoyable stay, shame about the mattress
Happy Review: location and decore
Unhappy Review: the mattress was way too hard

Review Title: lovely attentive and supportive staff and great facilities - need new matress
Happy Review: lovely clean location. staff very supportive and customer service 10/10. was given complimentary drink on arrival - food in the restaurant was excellent as were the breakfast selection.
Unhappy Review: the bed was uncomfortable - you could hear springs when moving round.

Review Title: We had a fabulous couple of days and we would return to stay at your hotel as it was so close to the
Happy Review: There was plenty of choice and the selection was great, good value for money and the food was delicious.
Unhappy Review: The shower cubicle did leak and the floor got wet daily because of this. Although I realise the doors have to be fire proof were they there was an awful lot of banging doors throughout our stay.

Review Title: Really enjoyed it everything about was great
Happy Review: The room was very clean and comfy at the back of the hotel overlooking the park, the breakfast was very good they cater for all need. The location of the hotel is good with a bus stop right outside but also not far to walk to centre
Unhappy Review: Nothing I enjoyed it all this is our second visit and will definitely be going back next year it’s the ideal place to stay for us for our needs

Happy Review: A very convenient stay, basic bit does what you need. The staff were super helpful & I could charge my car which was very helpful.
Unhappy Review: My room was clean, but the curtains & carpet were badly marked.

Happy Review: Location was good. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was clean and quiet.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast would have been better if served onto your plate by one person rather than everybody touching everything.

Happy Review: Good location and friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: There was a problem with the heating but the staff arranged a portable heater

Happy Review: The location was ideal, half way between the station and town center.
Unhappy Review: One night there was a lot of noise from emergency vehicles through the night, the next night was a lot quieter.

Happy Review: Good location, good breakfast, staff very friendly and accommodating
Unhappy Review: Paying for parking

Review Title: brilliant few days, sight seeing with friends.
Happy Review: very convenient for train station, buses and old city.
Nice that backed into tree lined area. Friendly service and managed to park in car park.
Unhappy Review: Room felt a bit basic. Shower not that brilliant. Only enough tea for one cup each.

Happy Review:
Comfortable bed
Clean room
Good breakfast with lots of options
Unhappy Review:
No heating in the bathroom 
Air conditioning wouldn't switch off in bedroom so stayed on through the night and was very noisy
Only 1 person on check in - not good when in a hurry

Happy Review: .The friendly staff and the clean warm room
Unhappy Review: ,It was a bit off the cenre, BUT it was advertised as  such.

Happy Review: Love the hotel, friendly staff, great breakfast and comfy bed
Unhappy Review: Paying for car parking

Review Title: definitely would stay again or recommend
Happy Review: modern bright clean good location
Unhappy Review: difficult to find the way in to the car park due Bristol no entry to some roads

Review Title: nice hotel, great location, good value
Happy Review: great location, good facilities, helpful staff
Unhappy Review: the car parking - too few spaces & the need to move from the overflow car park by 08.00hrs was a bit of a pain

Happy Review: Friendly helpful staff breaky great clean room
Unhappy Review: A map beforehand or on initial info on how to get into the place and park ………sat nav as staff stated didn’t have correct info!

Review Title: A welcomed relaxing Christmas break after a tough 20 months
Happy Review: Excellent breakfast and staff were friendly and attentive.  The room was on the small side but had a lovely view over the park.  Good location for the Christmas market and Carbot Circus - about a 10 minute walk
Unhappy Review: The room was small so a means to hang up coats on the way in would be useful as the wardrobe was difficult to access as it was close to the bed,

Happy Review: Central location, clean and comfortable

Review Title: busy vibrant city, hotel in good location
Happy Review: Very good value for money, very quiet room, really helpful staff
Unhappy Review: Difficult to find due to construction works in city centre and road closures

Review Title: The hotel made our visit to Bristol very enjoyable. Would definitely stay here again.
Happy Review:
Bed very comfortable. 
Room not noisy at all during the night which was good as it overlooked the busy main road. 
Great to have a fridge & hairdryer in room. 
Breakfast was enjoyable, plenty of choice
Location good for city centre
Checking in/out process very swift.
Peter on Reception went out to buy a paper for my partner on Saturday morning, much appreciated. Thanks to him.
Unhappy Review: Nothing I didn't like, all very good. thank you

Happy Review: Hotel was clean rooms were lovely bed really comfortable, staff friendly
Unhappy Review: Bit of cheek to charge as much as they do to park car in their own car park ,then difficulty trying to reverse out , when people are allowed to park  along wall where there's no parking bays ,

Review Title: mini break in excellent hotel within walking distance of main attractions.
Happy Review: location and staff
Unhappy Review: breakfast could have been hittr

Review Title: great trip away for a few nights!
Happy Review: the reception staff were great, and the location was ideal!
Unhappy Review: it’s a shame you have to pay separately to park there! the bed was very creaky too

Happy Review: Clean comfy room. Lovely breakfast
Everything basically OK
Unhappy Review:
Because of road works at time of visit, hotel hard to get into.
Although staff were helpful & friendly, lack of staff at times made waiting a little annoying.

Happy Review: Ideal location and not far from train station.  Nice hotel, good value.
Location was good had a few issues with staff and coffee regarding breakfast. Reception staff were very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Room wasn't refreshed no coffee and the fridge didn't work, wasn't informed about this.

Happy Review: very nice room, location excellent with being near the railway station, good choice of breakfast.
Unhappy Review: Down side - not enough choice of beers (ales) in the hotel bar (personal choice)

Happy Review: The room was a good size.

The reception and breakfast as well as Recess dinner staff were lovely. The lady (seemed to be the manager) at breakfast was super busy, but still had time to have a little chat with us which was very nice. The breakfast itself was delicious. The selection was nice and the food looked good on display. The reception offered us a bigger room, because we were travelling with a baby. That made us feel seen and understood. Thank you.
Unhappy Review: The Recess dinner menu in our opinion was a bit overpriced. The portions were small. But the food itself was delicious.

Happy Review: Nice room, plenty of facilities and the guest service was nice when I asked for new towels. The waiting service was excellent and we both liked the food.
Unhappy Review: Minibar could have been stocked and the TV remote might not have been working properly.

Review Title: All in, good. Disappointed with the food
Happy Review: Room was nice, clean, very happy generally. Good location
Unhappy Review: I was told there was a vegan breakfast, and paid 9.99 for it. However, it was just the sides of others - prefer it if you didn't advertise it as vegan, when it's just mushrooms, tomatoes, beans and greens.

Happy Review: Already wrote a review on TripAdvisor but yeah 8/10
Unhappy Review: Heating in room could be working properly

Happy Review: Clean comfortable room, friendly staff.... spotless front of house. Well done all.
central location, nice restaurant and very pleasant staff

Review Title: We have stayed before so knew what to expect and will be happy to stay again
Happy Review: Breakfast was excellent. Overall a good experience

Review Title: Enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back.
Happy Review: The hotel was in a good location, walking distance to the train station and the city centre. The staff at the hotel were very helpful and attentive, especially Leonardo who served behind the bar.
Unhappy Review: We were place on the laundry floor and could hear the machines in the middle of the night.

Happy Review: nice and easy access to rooms etc.
Unhappy Review: Very difficult to find the car park due to roads closed nearby. A route map would of been handy.

Happy Review: About 15 mins walk from Bristol Hippodrome.  Staff great.  Room size ok, mini cooler kept water cool, bed firm which I like and pillows comfy.  Excellent choice of breakfast and good value at £10 - included full english, pastries, continental, juice, fruit, cereal etc even had a decaf latte!!! Comfortable  bar/restaurant.
Unhappy Review: No usb ports in room - bit gutted as I didn't think to take the plug for phone so couldn't charge but in fairness description didn't say it so can't complain really.  Comfortable stay but overall a little expensive - 180 for a double room.  No info in room on safety procedures, restaurant opening times, bar menu etc.

Review Title: £94 for a room was more than I would normally pay but the hotel still made it value for money for good Bristol location
Happy Review: location,
location great , twin room clean and comfortable

Review Title: Good location for the city , friendly welcoming staff
Happy Review: Very helpful and friendly staff . Good location , parking on site . Restaurant on site.

Review Title: Si senor give the ball to Diaz
Happy Review: parking right out the front of the hotel. short walk to the city centre I believe I got a good price for the hotel so I got good value for money as the rooms were comfortable and they had orchard pig cider in the bar couple with a bererton Diaz equaliser for rovers I’ll take a point back up north content. Bristol is excellent.
Unhappy Review: nothing

Happy Review: Receptionist and restaurant staff were very friendly and happy to help. Had a great nights sleep
Unhappy Review: No parking, we had to pay £53 in another car park for 2 nights !! The hotel should offer discount for certain car parks around the city for the people staying at the hotwl

Happy Review: comfort
Unhappy Review: show room

Review Title: pleasant stay, would recommend for a short break to Bristol
Happy Review: Clean, comfortable, modern. Good basic facilities
Unhappy Review: bed was squeaky, but not a major issue

Happy Review: Clean and modern
Unhappy Review: All good nothing not to like.

Review Title: We liked the hotel itself and all the staff we had dealings with were courteous and very helpful. We did have lunch in t
Happy Review: Good location for us. Room clean and comfortable, loved the extra large bed. Double glazing amazing, couldn’t hear a sound from the busy road below, (we were on 4th floor). Large TV was great. Staff friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: En suite facilities a little on the small side, but clean and in good condition.

Happy Review: great and central, exactly what I needed. comfy room, nice staff and a good breakfast
Unhappy Review: I perhaps wouldn’t stay more than a few nights as it’s right on a busy main road … However the rooms are soundproof, so absolutely no issues with sleeping!

Review Title: Good location, rooms a little small
Happy Review: The location is good for the station and the town centre. Lifts are very quick! The park opposite is a nice green space. Room was well equipped. Clean facilities and pleasant staff.
Unhappy Review: The shower room is very small but the shower is powerful. The bed was quite firm (not as comfy as a Premier Inn bed!). The hotel is on a very busy road so quite noisy. The receptionist moved us to a room at the back which is quieter. She did this unasked when she saw our age and how long we were staying (4 nights) which was kind.

Review Title: We had a pleasant stay. Overall a comfortable hotel, great location.
Happy Review: The room was very clean and the bed comfortable.
Unhappy Review:
It was very noisy in the late afternoon/early evening.
The entrance to the parking was quite difficult to find.

Review Title: Great place shame about the breakfast
Happy Review: The room, the breakfast and the location were all excellent.
Unhappy Review: I thought that the breakfast were included in the price

Review Title: Overall vey good and I would return
Happy Review: Room and location.
Unhappy Review: Only thing was that the breakfast buffet had the worst sausages I have ever had in my long life.

Happy Review: Clean and cosy hotel with nice breakfast
Unhappy Review: Our fridge wasn't working and although the receptionists knew it, we were not informed and we had to explicitly ask for it to be fixed, once we discovered it. Also, we felt that the staff at the breakfast area were always in a hurry to close before time, as they started cleaning, and taking our dishes at 9.45 and that was a bit stressful.

Happy Review: Clean room
Unhappy Review:
Took a long time to check in.
Parking is awful!

Happy Review: Good location, I think the carpet in the rooms needs to be changed.
Unhappy Review: Carpet.

Review Title: great birthday night away and would recommend to others.
Happy Review: friendly and well mannered staff, clean hotel and good location to walk into the city centre
Unhappy Review: a little pricey for the car park but I suppose it’s to be expected in a city,

Review Title: Very happy with the hotel. Would definitely stay there again.
Happy Review: Breakfast was very good value for money. I'm gluten intolerant, staff very kindly arranged gluten free toast every morning. Pointed out what was safe to eat. Room was clean and comfortable. There's a little mini fridge in the room. Really handy . Location is 5 mins from Bristol temple meads train station. Quiet at night. Lovely restaurant & nice choice of food.
Unhappy Review: We felt the room was cold on arrival. We tried to alter the air conditioning, but still blew cold air. Turned it off. Shower was not strong enough, weak water pressure. Apart from that our weekend was really great.

Happy Review:
My stay at the hotel was everything I expected to be and the staff were exceptional - Even though we arrived at 1040 for breakfast on the Saturday the choice and quality was far better than I expected and the experience and friendliness of the catering staff was a exceptional - A good kick start to a very full itinerary on that day.
HOWEVER
I telephoned a few days prior to the visit to correct an error in the booking and ask a question about parking - After a strange  delay in connection  my enquiry - which I considered to be perfectly valid - was dealt with in a less than courteous manner and I rang off with the unacceptable feeling of  'Why Did I Bother ? and that same error was present on my booking when I arrived - Yet the very nice lady at the reception corrected it with a smile and no hassle.
My actual stay was superb and my colleague was exceedingly pleased as well.
Unhappy Review:
See above and in my particular room felt the bathroom was a little cramped but entirely functional - The tightness had obviously been experienced before as the toilet roll holder had received a knock or something before and was loose on the wall. - Plus i would have liked a better hook behind the door for my dressing gown.
Plus = Apart from a group of men that were very much into their cups at 3am on the Sunday morning and who decided to discuss when they should meet the next day outside my door {But this was not the fault of the hotel and well beyond their care} - Overall I was very impressed with the quietness in the room and we both slept extremely well

Happy Review: Very clean room. Comfy bed.
Unhappy Review: Common areas and hallways are a little shabby.

Happy Review: comfy bed
Unhappy Review: breakfast was a bit cold

Happy Review: clean and convenient with a very good breakfast
Unhappy Review: no where to park as car park was full. spent ages trying to find somewhere

Review Title: Exceeded my expectations, would stay again!
Happy Review: Was very impressed with this hotel. For the price of the room I wasn’t expecting amazing things, however upon arrival I was very surprised. I was immediately greeted with a very clean lobby and friendly reception staff. The room we had was on the top floor which meant a lovely view, the room was very large, clean and well presented. To show that nobody had been in the room after housekeeping, stickers were placed over the doors which I think is a brilliant idea considering covid circumstances ect. There was also a mini fridge in the room which was a delight!  Definitely worth the money!! We also tried out the bar and had some food which was delicious. The servers were incredibly polite and everything was priced very fairly for the quality!! The hotel itself is a 5 minute walk from the train station and was in a perfect location!

it’s location to we’re we wanted to go. The staff. we’re friendly. and  welcoming   the room was clean and comfortable Amdahl while the gym was small it was well equipped for anyone needing their exercise fix.
Unhappy Review: the only disappointing thing was breakfast on the first morning they appeared to have difficulty keeping up with demand with some items. Unless you were getting your food close to coming out of te kitchen it it cold very quickly.

Review Title: Great location, comfy bed, clean facilities. Friendly staff. Breakfast could be improved.
Happy Review: Room was fine. Bed was comfortable. Temperature was easy to control. As I was there for work I didn't stay in the room that much. The bathroom was small, but serviceable and clean. Shower was good! Breakfast was average - buffets are a hard thing to get right.
Unhappy Review: The breakfast could have been better. I know hot buffets are never as good as freshly cooked food, but this one was a little on the lukewarm side. It was fine. But it wasn't game-changing. I ate at local cafes the following days.

Happy Review: Receptionist upgraded our room for a double bed instead of twin bed at no extra cost
Unhappy Review: There is only one option of parking which is £16 for 24 hours, which I thought was a bit expensive.

Review Title: Great stay, Lovely reception staff, Clean hotel
Happy Review:
Room was clean 
Hotel in a good location as I am an avid walker thus nothing was too far.
There is a bus stop in front of the hotel.
a Tesco, Pret and Gregs is nearby so didn't have breakfast at the hotel.
Unhappy Review: Room was not cleaned on a daily basis - you had to make a request at reception the night before if you wanted the room cleaned. This was due to maintaining social distancing post CV. I think a sign outside the door should suffice if you didn't want the room to be cleaned. This is not an issue really but wanted to share as a FYI only.

Review Title: very nice helpful receptionist really enhanced our stay
Happy Review: reasonable price and receptionist was very helpful and professional - let us check in early which was really helpful as we were on a short break 3 nights and our time was limited. Also allowed us to store our luggage on the day if checkout
Unhappy Review: rooms a little small but overall was good value for money

Happy Review: Very welcoming! Cherry looked after us and showed us interesting places to visit and bars to go that were around Bristol - we had a lovely time! :)
very clean
Breakfast was good room comfy
Unhappy Review: For the price of the room expected breakfast to be included also carpark is £16 for 24hrs but you only get the room for 21hrs

Happy Review: Very  clean hotel, lovely staff great breakfast
Clean. nice staff nice location
Unhappy Review: Room next to elevator a bit noisy at night

Happy Review: Staff friendly and helpful. Good cocktails. Comfy beds. Fridge in rooms a bonus. No hassles.
Unhappy Review: Not too far from the centre but area not too inspiring. A nice little park and ruin next to it though which helped. The hotel is generic but I didn't expect anything else. A decent stay all in all.

Happy Review:
beds were large and comfortable
modern decor
large windows overlooking park
swivel chair!
Unhappy Review:
parking was stressful
approach to hotel with building works was terrible. hotel should provide instructions as at least one road was closed and meant we had to turn round twice to get access.

Happy Review: It was in a good location and close to Temple Meads station.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: Staff were all very helpful and friendly - as I am quite used to with most Hilton properties

Review Title: Bristol is a great city, and the hotel met all of our requirements.
Happy Review: The hotel is close to the station, and just a 5 or 10 minute walk to the central areas. First impressions are that the hotel is smart, bright, clean and business-like. Staff were welcoming and helpful. Rooms were a decent size and comfortable, self-service breakfasts were of good quality with plenty of choice.
Unhappy Review: The design and decor is conservative, nothing special, but that is purely a matter of personal taste, and I have no criticisms.

Review Title: ideal hotel for our 3 night stay
Happy Review: The hotel was central and easy walking distance to docks and shopping centres
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Room was well equipped  bed comfy and was very impressed with the soundproofing.  Our room overlooked a busy road and there was absolutely no traffic noise.  Very helpful and friendly staff.
Unhappy Review: Ambiance of the bar wasn't very appealing.   Also, the drink cans we bought to take to our room were very expensive.

Review Title: I had a good stay and staff were very friendly and the room was nice
Happy Review: The room was really nice and I liked the view
Unhappy Review: I would have liked to have dinner in my room, but there was no room service

Happy Review: Great bed, nice and quiet
Unhappy Review: would have liked a bath!

Review Title: Location superb, handy for station, bars, pubs, sight seeing
Happy Review: Location superb, very quiet, comfortable, cosy, plenty of tea and coffee, great place
Clean, comfortable room.
Unhappy Review: Parking was very difficult as was access due to closed roads etc.

Happy Review: I was given a rear facing room as the hotel was not overly busy.
Unhappy Review: N/A

Happy Review: We had an amazing dinner at the hotel restaurant. The staff there was particularly nice and they made us feel very welcome.

Review Title: Relaxing and comfortable, in a good location. Great value for money
Happy Review: The location was fantastic for getting into the city centre. Staff were friendly and helpful. The shower was always hot, bed very comfortable and the bar/restaurant area was great too.

Review Title: Enjoyable relaxing stay, would stay again especially considering how wonderful staff.
Happy Review:
Breakfast very good, good variety of cold or cooked food.
Had one evening meal which was again very good, although slightly restricted menu.
Staff are brilliant both in the restaurant and on reception, so friendly, chatty and helpful.
Great location city centre 20 minute walk, restaurants 10 - 15 minutes. 20 minutes to harbour with historic sites and buzzing cafes, bars and restaurants.
Unhappy Review: The bed - hard, lumpy with very noisy springs, couldn't move without twangs, grinds and clunks,

Happy Review:
Staff members were great. Any help you ask for..they were able to help
Food - Had dinner and breakfast once. Brilliant food.
Location - 10-15 mins walk to all the places -  railway station, City Centre,  Cabot circus for shopping and near the bus station
Unhappy Review:
Room - The room was adapted for guests with disability. so found it difficult for us to move around the room
Bed - Bed was little hard / rigid

Happy Review: It was very central to shopping and lots of restaurants and bars only a short walk away. Good location, nice and quiet so got a good nights sleep too.
Unhappy Review: The parking was an issue as the hotel is hard to drive too when you don’t know Bristol well. Maybe instructions should be written clearer.

Review Title: Perfect base for a stay in Bristol.  Friendly staff.
Happy Review: Very clean.  Good location.  Friendly and helpful staff
Unhappy Review: No issues to discuss.  Very satisfied.

Happy Review: Served my last minute need as I forfeited the other place I paid to stay
Unhappy Review: I was safe, staff very helpful. Clean room

Review Title: Get up really early for breakfast!!!
Happy Review: Room was clean and the beds were incredibly comfortable.
Unhappy Review: Breakfast. Queues were really long and items were constantly running out. Poor staff were run ragged. Much better to book a time at reception as in other hotels to manage the flow of traffic and improve customer experience. It is not a cheap hotel after all.

Happy Review: Good and plenty of choice.
It was all good👍
Unhappy Review: Staff are great and the location is perfect for central Bristol.. I will use this hotel as my regular stay..

Review Title: OK but for a Hilton Hotel would expect more client service.
Happy Review: Room was nice, staff excellent and location is very good.
Unhappy Review:
parking is a bit steep when you are a paying guest.
Breakfast was cold and you had to do it all of yourself, make your own hot drink, toast and serve yourself so not really value for money and for it to then be cold ? Had better food in a weatherspoon I am afraid.

Comfy bed.
Friendly staff.
Good value for money.

Review Title: Good location, great value for money, very clean with helpful friendly staff
Happy Review: Very good selection of cereal juices and cooked item Staff where very helpful
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: Location was good for railway station. Breakfast was ideal with plenty of options.
Unhappy Review: Price for the 3 nights was high but given that the Bristol marathon was on that weekend prices are always inflated because of the demand. Expensive but guess that's what hotels do alas..

Happy Review: Parking is bad, over charged on parking. Confusing bill payment.
Unhappy Review:
Cheaper parking and more parking.
Options to have a cold breakfast as an alternative to paying for both hot and cold regardless.

Happy Review: Self service laundry. Good for drying clothes in rainy day.
Unhappy Review: Poor sound proofing

Happy Review: Great location not far from the station and the city centre. Corridor a little noisy at night, otherwise a lovely stay.
Breakfast. Room. Staff. Gym. Price.
Unhappy Review: Room size.

The address, Temple Way and post code when inputted to a sat nav takes you to the front of the hotel, which has no access by car far from Temple Way. You have to arrive at the back of the hotel to park.

Happy Review: Breakfast and staff were exceptional. Fresh waffles and knowledgable, helpful and friendly staff who showed us where to go on a map they provided which tailored to our needs. Couple of minutes walk from the city centre and the harbour.
Unhappy Review: Slightly pricey but it's a hilton. Room a bit on the small side but fine.

Review Title: Ideal location, very comfortable, lovely staff
Happy Review:
Great location in walking distance of the city & harbour area. Bus stops right outside the door. Superb breakfast being replenished constantly so fresh and hot, caters for all.
Queen room was very small, but was clean and comfortable.
Helpful friendly staff making you feel very welcomed.
Unhappy Review: Queen room was disappointingly quite small, but was clean and comfortable.

Happy Review: Nice big comfortable room. Very clean and nice service.
Very clean, friendly service with fast check in and check out. Good value, walking distance to the centre.
Unhappy Review: Hard to find using standard maps! You have to access from the one way systems, which took us a while! The bed was hard, but the room was otherwise very comfortable!

Happy Review: The upbeat and obliging staff
Unhappy Review: The coffee making machine.....it's  the first time I have encountered problems with such a device

Happy Review: The location was perfect for us. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful, especially Cherry!
Unhappy Review: The bed was to hard for us.

Happy Review: Great location in centre of town. Limited parking outside hotel, I got the last space. Parking is expensive. Breakfast was very good and don’t have to checkout till 12.
Unhappy Review: Expensive, parking

Happy Review: Bed size
Unhappy Review: Lift broken

Happy Review: ALL
Unhappy Review: PRICE OF BEER

Happy Review: i thought it was a very nice hotel, good location and nice room to stay in and good for price 😊

Good location about 10 minutes walk from the station and within walking distance of the main attractions, pubs and restaurants.  Nice restaurant serving excellent food.  Comfortable, quiet and extremely clean room with a nice view of Temple Gardens at the back of the hotel.  Small gym but enough for a short break. Friendly, welcoming staff.
Unhappy Review: Nothing.

Happy Review: Super location and staff excellent

Review Title: Exceptional staff upgraded our overall experience from meh to very good!
Happy Review:
The housecleaning and reception staff were exceptionally helpful and very friendly.  
Comfy beds.
Handy for the trains and bus links and only a short walk to the city centre
Unhappy Review:
Fridge in our room smelt funny
Coffee machine was broken and buffet cold meats and cheeses were uncovered so guests were able to cough over it - so we went down the road to Barrista's for a good coffee and light breakfast for the rest of our stay.  
Seemed pricey for what was offered

Happy Review:
position is walking distance from city center, professional and kind staff
nice restaurant with good food and beer
Unhappy Review: using excuse of covid to stop cleaning the room and restoring room supplies (shampoo, showegel, coffee, etc...)

Happy Review: Lovely hotel in great location. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
Unhappy Review: Nil

Happy Review: Great location. Clean, comfortable room. Friendly helpful staff.
Unhappy Review: Cooked breakfast could have been warmer.

Happy Review: Breakfast was great, staff very friendly and helpful, the only downside was the location really as it is a little out of the way from the centre of Bristol but it’s very handy for getting to the train station

Review Title: Will be happy to stay here again
Happy Review: Decent location, clean facilities and friendly staff. Duty manager who was actually finished for the day, was particularly helpful when I was locked out of my room as the key card got deactivated.
Unhappy Review: Stayed at this chain of hotels before and had hoped for a coffee machine but just had a basic kettle. Friendly staff but check in took ages and not everyone likes chit chat. Just glad I got there before the coach tour party checked in.

Review Title: an excelent venue,well situated to accessing the attractions the city of Bristol
Happy Review:
Breakfast,good selection plus excelent staff.
Evening meal ,limited selection but well presented and tasty.
Room facilities excelent and comfortable.
Staff always cheerfull and very helpful
Unhappy Review: A bit of difficulty accessing hotel because of ongoing traffic development in the area,maybe could have advised customers in advance

Happy Review: Good location. Had air con. Good bar. Helpful staff even later at night.
Unhappy Review: Nothing really.

Happy Review:
Location 
Good staff
Unhappy Review: A bit expensive

Happy Review: Clean and functional
Unhappy Review: I requested a Queen room but was allocated a twin room.
This review has been hidden because it doesn't meet our guidelines.

Happy Review: Everything
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Review Title: Very nice and close to centre! Had lots of fun just shame about the fridge cooler
Happy Review: Great staff and very clean, and well air conditioned
Unhappy Review:
The fridge cooler was not actually cold or working and was the same as room temperature so we couldn't leave any fizzy drinks and leftover take away food inside to keep overnight for next day, although the staff offered kindly to take our stuff for us, we felt little bad to bother them
Tuesday morning there was a fire alarm kind of going on and off in the morning but we weren't told about a "check" because it went off after 5 seconds. Then started again then stopped again

Happy Review: Clean and comfortable
Unhappy Review: An alarm went off both mornings apparently it could be to do with steam from showers

Happy Review: The blackout curtains, air con.
Unhappy Review: I could have done with an extra duvet

Happy Review: Good Location and Clean. Perfect for the occasion
Unhappy Review: Nothing

Happy Review: The hotel was nice and central, clean and bright with friendly staff
Unhappy Review: We had to pay an extortionate amount for parking which was not very clear when we booked.  We did get an email regarding this but after we booked. The parking cost needs to be clearer at time of actual booking.  We were lucky to get a space.  If the hotel/city had been busier parking would have been an issue.

Review Title: Good food and drink and service .But parking on site was expensive.
Unhappy Review: Parking expensive.

Review Title: A enjoyable break that wasn't spoilt by the hotel but only enhanced by it.
Happy Review: Location to train station n city centre.and the staff was very accomendating.
Unhappy Review: No issues to report

Happy Review: The location being just out of the main hub of the city and by Temple gardens which was great, and therefore not so busy. The staff were wonderful and friendly. The facilities were great, and everywhere was very clean which was reassuring.
Unhappy Review: The only downside to the stay was the constant white noise buzzing in the room (from the air/heating con I presume - even though I had the system on the off button) which was annoying at night and did not make for a very restful night's sleep. Ear plugs came in handy. But that was the only downside to an otherwise great stay.

Review Title: Good hotel for city break or business travel.
Happy Review: Nice city centre hotel, good value for money. Nice room, decent breakfast. Easy to walk and get something to eat. Free parking from 6pm till 8am then you need to pay.
Unhappy Review: All in all it is as expected, if not slightly better.

Happy Review: Breakfast was ok, staff very friendly and helpful
Unhappy Review: Bathroom a little small

Review Title: Clean, safe, good base for exploring
Happy Review:
Clean rooms
Lovely staff on reception who were very helpful with our checkin 
Well equipped rooms- ample wardrobe space with enough hangers, mini fridge, iron and ironing board.
Comfortable enough, central location
Unhappy Review: only stayed one night

Happy Review: The staff at Bristol is absolutely lovely. Friendly, helpful, gracious and really kind. It was impressive.
Unhappy Review: The location was a little tired. Hilton's in general are not great value for money: rooms are way too small given the price.

Happy Review: It was a convenient location close to all amenities - the staff were really welcoming expecially Peter at the reception desk who couldn’t do enough to help us throughout our stay
Unhappy Review: The parking situation - when the car park was full the hotel allowed people to park in unmarked bays meaning at 10am when I came to leave I couldn’t as a work van was blocking me in - this is annoying having paid £32 for two days parking only to be blocked in and the hotel allowing it as they know how much they have taken in parking fees why would they continue to take money and allow people to park there blocking others and Delaying my exit by around 30 mins

Happy Review:
COVID/cleanliness/protocol/was/top/notch
